122121143.content: Shu's footsteps recede behind me and I let my fist fall open. The edges of the badge aren't sharp and it hasn't cut my skin, despite the pain it caused.

122121144.content: I guess nothing you gave me could ever hurt me.

122121145.content: The waves are getting louder. I put on my headphones and start playing that song Ver and I once listened to together. Then I lie down on the sand.

122121146.content: When I'm tired, I like to gaze at some far-off point. The further the better. That always helps me relax.

122121147.content: Is there anywhere further away than the sky?

122121148.content:
I gaze up at the moon and stars. My loneliness seems to be outlined by the streetlamps.
I don't even feel sad. I'm too tired, too numb.

122121149.content: Would it... Would it be better if we'd never met?

122121150.content: I'm exhausted. I don't want to think about it...

122121151.content: It is what it is. Forget the things you were never meant to know, just like you forgot your past. Forget the things you have no power to change.

122121154.content: "Then I realized all my doubts and misgivings were just me cheating myself... like closing my eyes."

122121157.content: A voice in my headphones brings me back to reality. The night sky comes back into focus and my jaw drops. Am I imagining things?

122121159.content: The hot air balloons now hang low, like falling fireworks. But their light are still shining in the sky, illuminating the heavens. It's as if there's a layer of ice up there, and time is rushing past on the other side.

122121160.content: "Relax. I'll protect you no matter what!"

122121163.content: The voice is faint but clear. A voice that brings me back to myself. I sit up on the sand. My chest is burning, pulsating in time with my heartbeat. I stand and sprint, as if possessed, towards the city.

122121164.content: The next thing I know, I'm in an alleyway. I remember Ver and I came here, very early on. This is where, she said, I once saved her.

122121165.content: As I'm about to walk forwards, the air in front of me splits as if sliced open. There's a white-hot line, like a crack in a mirror.

122121166.content: It's like a fire inside me has been reignited. In the light of the rift I see the footprints that have led me to where I am, footprints I had long lost sight of.

122121167.content: It's like the first time we met. I tried to save you, but it turned out you were the one to save me.

122121168.content:
Back then... what did you say?
"You are my friend, and friends must be treasured..."

122121169.content: The suffocating aura of the Source Layer approaches from the rift. For the last time, I open my terminal and flick through my photo album, looking for that first picture.

122121170.content: The first picture to prove I existed. The young girl with the happy smile. I remember how tightly she held my hand, as if she was scared of losing me.

122121171.content: Haven't I always been able to remember things like this?

122121172.content: What... What did I do to make her look for me for so long?

122122001.content: There is no day and night in the Source Layer. I have no way of telling how long I've been moving through it.

122122002.content: I'm surrounded by the threatening sounds of Visbane activities. But something, something innate within my consciousness, seems to keep them away. They never get close.

122122003.content: Even so, it's impossible for humans to travel through the Source Layer, right?

122122004.content: It's like walking through a desert sandstorm. Every step forward, I'm ground down, eroded. I'm so tired even the pain can't keep me alert, but some instinct drives me to keep walking, no matter the cost.

122122005.content: But I have to find Ver... Even if I...

122122006.content: And that sandstorm batters my very consciousness. Every step I take in this endless place leaves me weaker, until eventually I am unable to maintain whatever it is that keeps the Visbanes away.

122122007.content: No matter how determined I am, there are limits to what I can do... Just will I regret if I stop here?

122122008.content: "And because I wanted to protect them, I decided to keep living like this."

122122009.content: "No matter what the price, I will protect the people I want to protect, and the future I want to see."

122122010.content: Scarlet claws swipe at me, accompanied by screeches and screams. I reach for my hip, as always, but stop my hand before it reaches the belt.

122122012.content: Because there is nothing. The Visbanes have thrown me into the depths of the Source Layer and I'm still reaching for a weapon that doesn't exist? It's laughable.

122122013.content: But it's a motion that has saved me many times. There's no way for me to forget it.

122122014.content: There's nothing there, because I'm already holding what I'm trying to reach for.

122122015.content: Still falling, I raise the Delusion Buster and aim back the way I came, at the strange sky of the Source Layer. Where the distant cries are coming from.

122122017.content: The sky cracks like a thin layer of ice. A young girl turns in surprise before reaching out a hand to me. She smiles in relief...

122122018.content: That was close! If I'd been here any later you'd have fallen...

122122019.content: Just like I'd have fallen in Source Layer that day, if you'd been any later?

122122020.content: Wait, you remember that? It was...

122122021.content: I don't know... Let's talk when we get back.

122122022.content: It could still be just the two of us when we're out of here. Gremory's tough. Do you have a plan?

122122023.content: You miss all the action if you take time to plan. And we can't just hide here, can we? She'll know where we are anyway...

122122024.content: Okay, let's go. And see what's waiting for us.

122122025.content: But how did you find me? Isn't this some kind of mental space? Didn't Gremory have you trapped?

122122026.content: Hey, are you trying to annoy me with all the questions? I'll tell you when we get back.

122122027.content: I hurry after her. What else could I do? As we walk side-by-side my hand brushes hers. Neither of us pull away. Suddenly, in a moment of decisiveness, I take her hand in mine and hold it tight.

122122028.content: You... It must have been tough.

122122029.content: I feel a momentary shudder in her hand. Her eyes widen as she stares at me for a few seconds before lowering her head and giving a wistful smile.

122131001.content: As soon as my eyes open I take a defensive stance. I shift my arms—there's a wall or something right behind me, blocking any retreat. I test my legs.

122131002.content: (Why am I lying on the ground?)

122131003.content: I get to my feet and take my finger off the Delusion Buster's trigger. There's a deep bullet hole in the ground.

122131004.content: (Did I fire and wake myself up? Never mind. I'm awake, that's what matters.)

122131005.content: Ver's beside me, sword and shield at the ready. We look at each other and exchange nods. Our foe is too close to allow for analysis of the situation.

122131006.content: What were you trying to do, sending us into dreams like that?

122131007.content: Gremory doesn't seem fazed by our awakening. She's sitting on a nearby bench, gazing up at the sky.

122131008.content: I don't know how long we were under for, but I can see that the light from the Astral Engine is entirely gone now. There are flashes from above, presumably from fighting.

122131009.content: The views from Port Carp are better, meaning we can see what's happening outside Yu Jing. Rocks float about, crisscrossing each other, dancing back and forth like points of starlight reflected on an ocean.

122131010.content: And in the endless dark below Yu Jing, a shape is approaching. Something sharp and ridged.

122131011.content: Was it a dream? Or just another reality?

122131012.content: Gremory seems entirely unconcerned that the city could be smashed to pieces any second. She stands and I see those soul-penetrating eyes glance over our weapons. She doesn't seem to be about to attack.

122131013.content: Couldn't you do it, human? Couldn't you leave the Mods behind, and just live the life of an ordinary person?

122131014.content: I don't know. I guess I didn't really have a choice before. But now I know Ver, and how she and the others are fighting for us. I can't just sit back and let them fight alone.

122131015.content: And now I have a right to choose my own way of living. Why should you get to decide my future like that? You think I'm here on vacation or something?

122131017.content: I don't care how powerful you are. I won't let you hurt Admin again.

122131018.content: Ah, how blind emotions make us...

122131019.content: I don't know how you got yourself out. But you're driving yourself to the point of collapse, all for this human. Turing does not want to talk to a broken doll.

122131021.content: I'm fine, Admin. Just a bit dizzy. Don't listen to her.

122131022.content: There are still Visbanes on the streets, not to mention that huge rock flying toward us. I need to deal with Gremory as quick as I can so I can help the others protect Yu Jing.

122131023.content: Why try so hard? What's the point? When you escaped my mind control, I could already sense the difference between you and the Verthandi from when I entered your mind.

122131024.content: Your self is collapsing. If you carry on like this you will no longer recognize yourself. Then how will you know who this human is? You might even kill...

122131027.content: I won't, ever! I know myself. I know I could never do that.

122131028.content: Admin, I'm still not sure what's going on... but can you trust me?

122131029.content: In the open spaces of the port, Ver's silhouette looks thin and insubstantial. And somehow different from when I last saw her.

122131030.content: I have no idea what she's going through or how she woke me up from that endless dream. But I have no doubt that none of it has been easy for her.

122131032.content: You can tell me, no matter what it is. I'm not saying I'll have any answers, but I can share the problem.

122131033.content: We're friends, Ver. We'll stand by each other, no matter what we face. Just like we have done so many times in the past.

122131035.content: I know you always care for me, Admin.

122131036.content: Ver turns to smile back at me before turning and stepping forward to meet Gremory.

122131037.content: Why always make things so hard for yourself?

122131038.content: A red figure flickers towards Ver. Gremory is, as always, as quick as a thought. But this time, so is Ver.

122131039.content: I see sparks fly from the Shield of Fate and then, just like earlier in the city, Bane Energy tears through the Source Layer, creating a huge fissure which swallows them both.

122131040.content: But this time I saw more clearly what was happening. I rush forward, but my communicator sounds. Despite the situation I know I have to check it—it could be Odin. I glance at the screen.

122131042.content: The message is from Ver, who I just saw get pulled into the Source Layer. It's so bizarre that for a moment I wonder if I'm still in Gremory's dream-world. And in that brief moment of hesitation, the rift closes.

122131044.content: Up here. I can see you down there.

122131045.content: I look up. Sure enough, I can make out two distant figures, facing off atop a floating rock.

122131046.content: Hold on! I'm coming to help.

122131047.content: Don't. We agreed, remember? You'd trust me.

122131048.content: Are you kidding? That's a Cognizant Visbane! You can't fight her alone—

122131050.content: That's why you can't come up here. Gremory is too much for you.

122131051.content: I may be tired, and dizzy. But I'm holding on to one thing. Protecting you.

122131053.content: Admin, you've always been a good friend to me. You always worry about me. And I feel the same about you. And sometimes... maybe a little bit more.

122131054.content: I know friends should look after each other no matter what, and I understand that's what you're thinking right now.

122131055.content: But maybe you could indulge me this one time? I mean, I'm a Mod, and you're human, so it's my job to protect you. My duty. It's not meant to work the other way around.

122131056.content: I hope you won't be mad at me. And if you're still worried, I can make another promise to you.

122131057.content: The next time we talk, we'll both be safe and sound...

122131058.content: She doesn't wait for my response. Maybe she's scared what I'm going to say might change her mind. Ver ends the call and tightens her grip on her sword and shield.

122131060.content: Your dream-world won't fool me a second time.

122131061.content: That was nothing. Surely you don't think you can beat me in this world?

122131062.content: No matter how you fight, this only ends one way.

122132001.content: I'm two kilometers away from the fight, but I still hear that chilling clank.

122132003.content: Even the toughest of Access Keys fails to withstand that juggernaut of constant Bane Energy attacks.

122132004.content: Her shield shatters, her sword breaks. Gremory's attacks pummel her, sending her tumbling and flying.

122132005.content: I told you. You can't change how this ends.

122132006.content: And if this laughable performance is the best you can do, you owe your human friend an apology.

122132007.content: Why should anyone trust in you, when this is the best you have?

122132009.content: Admin doesn't trust me because I insisted on this fight. I insisted on this fight because Admin trusts me. That's why I'm in this to the very end.

122132010.content: And now? When you don't even have a weapon to wield?

122132011.content: Will you continue this futile struggle to protect... what? A miserable, broken future?

122132012.content: I will never regret my choices.

122132013.content: You have the will, but not the strength. And what use is will without strength?

122132014.content: Regardless of what you intend, it's time to rest a while.

122132015.content: A cage of Bane Energy forms around Ver, holding her locked in place. Gremory is about to knock her unconscious when a bullet splits the air.

122132017.content: Gremory, in complete control of the situation, easily blocks the bullet with a Bane Energy barrier. It slows her a second, but does no harm.

122132018.content: But that first bullet is only the start of a fusillade. A second, a third, a fourth... A single bullet presents no threat to a Cognizant Visbane. But physical attacks are all about quantity, not quality.

122132019.content: When ten or more bullets strike in one small area in quick succession, they pack as much punch as a Mod at full strength.

122132021.content: Her barrier cracks and Gremory turns to the side to evade the final bullet. With a mental order, she sends nearby Visbanes to seek out the origin of those shots.

122132022.content: And in that brief moment, the Bane Energy cage holding Ver shatters. Gremory looks at her and sees Ver free of her bonds, clutching her chest and gasping for breath.

122132023.content: I knew... it won't be... easy...

122132025.content: I'm a Modifier. A few cuts and bruises... are nothing to me.

122132026.content: And Admin isn't giving up. So I guess I can't, either.

122132027.content: Now, if I want to stop you... Would this work?

122141003.content: Don't move, don't make a sound. Stay quiet and hide in here. Nobody will find you, nobody will be able to hurt you.

122141005.content:
Yes, that's it. You're better off alone.

Don't reply to anything they say, don't react if they look at you.

Avoid them all and do what the adults tell you.

122141006.content: Imagine they're just a breeze passing by. Or raindrops drying in the sun. All this will pass. You're in your own little world. Quiet and safe.

122141007.content: What are you doing here all alone? Can't you sleep?

122141008.content: It's very late. If you don't get enough sleep you'll get sick.

122141010.content: Do you like the yard? I like it too. I often lean out the window and enjoy the view.

122141011.content: Sometimes, a breeze knocks the osmanthus blossoms off the trees. Then, if it rains, they'll be like a glimmering golden carpet.

122141012.content: Looking at the yard makes me feel like I'm connected to the outside world. It makes me feel less lonely when I'm alone.

122141014.content: Why not look up and see? You're already here, so why not look a little further? Stand on tiptoes and look over the fence.

122141015.content: There are people waiting for you.

122141019.content: Ver jerks awake, to find herself standing in a vast open space she's never seen before. She clutches her Access Key, still stunned by Gremory's onslaught.

122141020.content: I remember being on the street. And pushing Admin away. Then being pulled into the Source Layer. But after that...

122141021.content: Then what happened? Do you know?

122141022.content: Oh. So you can see me in here, of course. And it seems we can talk to each other.

122141023.content: It's really you... Where are we?

122141024.content: Normally, I can only hear your voice in my dreams. Am I dreaming?

122141025.content: Things are a little special here. You've escaped an illusion others have created for you. But you aren't fully awake.

122141026.content: This is a place we built together. A limbo for your mind to rest a while. Ahead, reality. Behind, illusion. You can choose where to go.

122141027.content: Reality, of course. I can't rest when there's a battle to be fought!

122141028.content: But what if... what if there's someone you left behind?

122141029.content: What if someone got trapped back there while trying to save you? Someone who is... adorably determined.

122141030.content: That sounds like what happened when I saw... Wait. Was that really Admin!?

122141031.content: Ver looks back down the road and the vast darkness that lies at its end. Panicked, she starts to run towards that cage she freed herself from only moments ago, without a glance back at the light.

122141032.content: Are you sure you want to go back? That's a mind space, you know.

122141033.content: What do you mean? Is it dangerous?

122141034.content: Gremory has created those independent spaces, and she's the master of them all. Even the smallest will defend itself against intruders, keeping you from affecting what happens "inside the box".

122141035.content: And while what happens there may not be real, this is the real you that stands here. Your one and true consciousness. Any dangers you face will be real. If you die there, you die everywhere.

122141036.content: But that means if anything happens to Admin, then...

122141037.content: Yes. Or even if nothing happens. If you accept what's in there as being real, your consciousness gets lost. You mix up what's real and what's illusion, and you'll never make it out.

122141038.content: That's the real reason Gremory wanted you there. She wanted you to give up on what you were fighting for. I was able to wake you up, but I can't protect you. Unless...

122141040.content: Yes. I have to get Admin out.

122141041.content: If you wanted to come back here, I could help you.

122141042.content: Thanks, but I want... I want to be with Admin.

122141043.content:
I see...
It might not be as easy to find them as you think.

122141044.content: The person you're looking for is stuck in a fake past, while you're in a real present. If you want to find them and intervene, you need to travel across more than space.

122141045.content: So I guess I'll have to run back through time.

122141046.content: Ver runs backwards through time, and time does everything it can to stop her. All the pain and suffering she's ever encountered is made physical, barriers to her progress, obstacles to be overcome.

122141047.content: But now, unlike before, she has to face it all alone. She has no friends by her side, only endless battles ahead of her.

122141048.content: Foes she once fought alongside a team, she now has to kill alone, just her and her sword. And kill them she must.

122141049.content: Every battle leaves her mind battered and bruised. Her body no longer serves to cushion the blows. The pain and the exhaustion are more direct now, magnified endlessly. She is climbing a mountain, every rock a razor's edge.

122141050.content: She knows that everything she sees is not real, but her sensory impressions start to mix with those from her memories of reality. Countless healed wounds reopen and drip fresh blood.

122141051.content: She loses track of how many times she becomes hopeless and wants to give up. But she grits her teeth and fights on, each time carrying new scars.

122141052.content: One... more step. C'mon, feet. You got it in you.

122141053.content: Hurry up and recover. You're a Mod, aren't you? You get hurt, you heal. It's what we do.

122141054.content: An unreal sun sets, an unreal moon rises, a cycle that never ends. She has no idea how many of these battles she's fought now. She's like a clockwork toy, driven ever onwards, intact on the outside but empty on the inside.

122141055.content: Fight. Recover. Fight. Recover. Every ounce of her lifeforce is spent in relentless forward motion. She doesn't even think about what lies ahead.

122141056.content: Because there is only one end to this road. It's the reason she's on it.

122141058.content: Her sword hand weakens, so she ties the blade in place.

122141059.content: Her Divine Power is consumed, so she fights with only her physical attacks.

122141060.content: Her wounds pain her, so she numbs the pain by humming that song they listened to together.

122141061.content: Her consciousness fades, so she says that name to herself.

122141062.content: #{nickname}#... is still waiting. I need to hurry.

122141063.content: If you've made a promise, you keep the promise.

122143001.content: Each copy of consciousness is unique.

122143002.content: Even if we try to remember what exactly we felt yesterday, we fail. Yesterday is already the yellowing pages of an old diary. Gone, as good as forgotten. No matter how we try to recall it, it is no longer real.

122143003.content: That face in the mirror seems to be her own. The Runic Blade's Divine Power feels as real as ever. Even that ribbon in her hair looks exactly like hers.

122143004.content: So you're just like them. Illusions created by Gremory, here to stop me. Right?

122143005.content: Do you plan to kill me? To kill yourself just to save someone you know is already lost?

122143006.content: You aren't me. I won't hesitate.

122143009.content: The sword stabs at the illusion's heart. But that voice in her head affects her movement. The illusion watches, impassively, as the point of the sword pierces its shoulder.

122143011.content: Blood spurts from both bodies. Ver watches as her shoulder turns red. She's already used to the pain, but... why?

122143012.content: "You need to look after yourself no matter what happens. Don't be sad, and don't cry."

122143014.content: "Think of all the wonderful things you could do in the future. The people you'll love and the people who'll love you."

122143015.content: "So many things are waiting for you, waiting for you to experience, with that smile on your face. So take my hopes and..."

122143017.content: That day, she leans by the hospital window just like her, those words echoing in her ears.

122143018.content: The cold stars fade as a warm light rises. In the first sunrise she wipes her tears dry and, for the first time in a long time, smiles.

122143019.content: Did you forget our promise to live well? Was it really so long ago?

122143020.content: As if she's unable to feel any pain, "Ver" grabs at the blade sticking into her shoulder and pulls it out slowly, before lifting the Runic Blade.

122143021.content: Choose. Turn around and live your best life...

122143022.content: Or continue to undervalue it, and kill the past you, right here.

122142002.content: "Maybe the old me has always been here. But buried. Sleeping, perhaps."

122142003.content: "But I still hurt. I'm still scared of dying. And I still have times like this, when I don't know what to do."

122142004.content: "Am I standing in my own way? I'm aware that I'm not as brave as I'd like to be. I know I can't do this, so I want to allow myself to run away this once..."

122142005.content: Ver sits in the yard, her head down. She touches the wound in her shoulder tentatively.

122142007.content: "Maybe the wounds of the past are still there. It's just we promised each other never to be sad..."

122142009.content: The voice, one not known for very long, comes from above. Ver clutches her shoulder, a bit nervous.

122142011.content: Of course. I said I'd take you out today.

122142012.content: Do you remember all those places I told you about? "Ghost lights" by the sea, the masked singers on the shopping streets, the miming magicians at the library... And I've got BBQ coupons, if you want BBQ.

122142014.content: She lifts her head and stretches a slender hand out to the child sitting on the wall, then hesitates and draws it back.

122142016.content: What? We're just going out for some fun. Isn't that allowed?

122142017.content: That's not what I mean. I'm... I've never been out before.

122142018.content: Are you worried we might run into some trouble?

122142020.content: Don't worry. Ain Soph is a very law-abiding place.

122142021.content: Anyway, we'll go together. And since we're friends...

122142024.content: A friend... I... I will too...

122142025.content: What are you saying? I can't hear you.

122142026.content: The girl plucks up the courage to stretch out her hand. To her friend, and to the world on the other side of the wall.

122142028.content: The child on the wall is surprised. It's a very brave thing for the girl who always cowers in the yard to say.

122142029.content: Because you're my friend. And friends must be treasured...

122142030.content: You're lowering your voice again. Hey, you sound good and confident when you speak louder!

122142032.content: Hey, let's make a deal then. We'll be brave, and never abandon each other!

122142033.content: She takes her friend's hand and feels lighter. As if the moon is lifting her up.

122142034.content: "Maybe for that person, that wasn't even a promise..."

122142035.content: "Because even when the past is forgotten, I was never abandoned."

122142036.content: And I've taken that courage and used it to fight to where I am now.

122142037.content: A bright future. People I love. The life I want.

122142038.content: All those things you spoke of... I think I have them already.

122142039.content: But it turns out that beautiful things break easily.

122142040.content: If you want to keep them, you've got to give all you have.

122142041.content: And sometimes even that is not enough. Even greater sacrifices have to be made...

122142042.content: But it's worth it, I guess...

122142043.content: After all, if we can't find the courage to protect the things we love, how can we claim to be living well?

122142044.content: Two minds. Mirroring each other, opposing each other. Both battered and scarred.

122142045.content: Ver wipes the blood from the corner of her mouth and again points her sword at the other her.

122142046.content: Because of that love, I decided to keep living like this.

122142047.content: No matter what the price, I will protect the people I treasure and the future I want to live in.

122142050.content: Ver senses something behind her and turns. It's as if there's a thin layer of ice there, and in the depths beyond the ice a rising light.

122142051.content: The flash of flame at the muzzle of a gun.

122142052.content: That's a promise we made together.

122151002.content: (I'm not powerful enough to defeat Gremory. I can't protect Admin unless I get stronger.)

122151003.content: (It's okay. Like I said, I'll be waiting for you when you're ready to come back.)

122151004.content: (Is there really nothing I can do to control it?)

122151006.content: (It's too far beyond you. It's like trying to steer a huge ship with a single oar.)

122151007.content: (But if I'm the one who uses it, it should follow my orders. Right?)

122151008.content: (Ms. Gengchen said that having a good control over our powers is the most fundamental skill for all Mods. But I'm trying to deny this power, as if it's not mine, so I can't use it properly...)

122151009.content: (If you use it, it will consume you. You are right to deny it.)

122151010.content: (But I need to use it now. Even if it's not mine to use. Even if I shouldn't use it.)

122151011.content: (If I focus, if I use all my strength, then I'm sure I can control it...)

122151013.content: A squeeze of the hand gives her warmth and power, helping her relax. She watches the person who runs up from behind, then lowers her head and smiles. Her eyes, though, start to burn with determination.

122151014.content: Red lines start to appear on her skin. Her eyes flicker, her limbs shake as if with unimaginable pain.

122151015.content: Gremory watches the young girl in front of her, unsure of what she's seeing. There's a familiar energy emanating from Ver—intermittently, but it's there—and Gremory isn't sure if she should attack or not. And as she hesitates, everything changes.

122151016.content: A brilliant light emerges from the golden emblem in Ver's left eye. She's calmed down now. The broken sword in her hand starts to absorb the raw energy that hangs in the surrounding air—even Bane Energy. And as that energy whirls around her, she becomes ever more imposing.

122151017.content: Now I see why Turing was so fascinated by you...

122151018.content: Tell the Visbanes to stop attacking Admin.

122151019.content: You sensed that very quickly. What a change...

122151020.content: But it is clear this power you wield does not belong to you. How long can you control it?

122151022.content: Your friend will die when Xu Heng is destroyed. It's a matter of time. If you care so much, wait and remake them in the new world.

122151023.content: Humans are weak little things. Chess pieces to be played with. Friends, lovers, servants. All disposable... You'll be able to choose any of them, one day.

122151024.content: You... You must be insane. Admin is not a piece in your game. Admin is... Admin.

122152001.content: Ugh... Where is this power coming from?

122152002.content: Repeated attacks have left Gremory unable to maintain the huge Bane Energy output and she returns to her human form. Before she can even move, Ver's broken sword is aimed at her.

122152003.content: Don't you have someone to rescue?

122152004.content: Gremory tries to push herself upright, but a bolt of resplendent golden light shoots towards her from Ver's sword, draining the last ounce of her energy.

122152005.content: You want to destroy Xu Heng and kidnap me. Fine. But none of that has anything to do with Admin.

122152006.content: You've lost. So tell the Visbanes surrounding Admin to back off.

122152007.content: Are you going to spare me? Or are you about to reach your limits as well?

122152009.content: Ver's silence gives Gremory a hint as to what is happening. But just then, a huge crashing noise rumbles up from below Yu Jing.

122152010.content: From their perch on the floating rock, in the glow of all the floating Cloudsong Ore and the light of all the machinery, the two can see the giant object which is crashing towards Yu Jing.

122152011.content: It is a mountain. A great arrow of momentum and mass, aimed at Yu Jing's heart. The particle cannons spin to fire at it immediately, but their attacks do no more harm than pinpricks.

122152012.content: Finally. Looks like Novich has done some actual damage this time.

122152014.content: This is Xu Heng's destiny. It should have ended during the Cloudsong Crisis long ago, or in a future one. All we've done is made it happen a little earlier.

122152015.content: If you want to stop it, be my guest. I cannot deny how powerful you've become. Perhaps you could smash that mountain into dust.

122152016.content: But you are still you. Your weaknesses are as obvious as ever.

122152017.content: I know how much you care about that human. So if things come to a point where I have to get you out of my way, I won't mind—

122152018.content: Once the monsters arrived and encircled me, I've been too busy to follow the fight up there on the floating rock. Though, the Visbane attack was expected—after all I did fire a dozen or so sniper shots at Gremory.

122152019.content: Yet while taking my final shot I saw, through my scope, another new energy wave, something utterly powerful. I don't know what Ver did, but I could see that Gremory was struggling. That made me feel a bit relieved.

122152020.content: But what do all these Visbanes want?

122152021.content: The Delusion Buster is a powerful weapon, but its capacity is much lower than my usual weapon and it fires more slowly. It isn't the right weapon to be surrounded by Visbanes with, so all I can do is hold it tight and run for my life.

122152022.content: But the Visbanes don't seem set on killing me. They just chase me, seemingly happy to keep me away from the port... assuming I keep running in a straight line.

122152023.content: Exactly what is Gremory up to?

122152024.content: This is no good. I need to figure out how to get back and help Ver.

122152025.content: I have no idea that their battle is already drawing to a close. But I do notice that the Visbanes on my tail have slowed down.

122152026.content: Just when I'm checking the map to figure out how to sneak back, there's a huge tremor which almost sends me flying into the air.

122152028.content: When that huge fist of rock, laden with Bane Energy, strikes me, I automatically raise my gun to block it and move backwards.

122152029.content: But it comes at me like a giant battleship, knocking me almost senseless. I fly upwards, as if gravity has been reversed.

122152030.content: Everything spins out of control. I soar high over the edge of Yu Jing and see, far off below, the mountain that is already at the edge of Yu Jing.

122152033.content: Go save your friend. Yu Jing's high, but they won't fall forever.

122152034.content: Gremory is gazing, rapt, at the mountain that is about to crash into the city, seemingly not worried about Ver's next move.

122152035.content: Perhaps Ver is angry enough to deal the killing blow before setting off on her rescue mission.

122152036.content: Or perhaps saving the human is more important... But either way, it doesn't matter to Gremory.

122152037.content: Do you understand now? It's all about priorities. When you choose one thing, you let another slip away.

122152038.content: So you have to choose what to do with the time you have left. Kill me, or save them. Your call.

222011001.content: In Ruomu there is a saying, "Meditation builds character, frugality nurtures virtue." Once led astray, those whose minds lack clarity will find no return path.

222011002.content: Different worlds stretch out upon the canvas. Yet, in a hundred years, only a few have truly seen through the scenes.

222011003.content: You are here? I have been waiting.

222011005.content: Tell me, how does one paint that which they have never laid eyes on?

222011007.content: This great Mount Xiaoyang that you and I find ourselves on is just a few hundred meters tall, yet we cannot see the sun for the fog enveloping it.

222011008.content: I have been residing here from long ago. I know the beauty of this place well. Now, I wish to commit this magnificent view to canvas, and yet, I have never seen it in its entirety.

222011010.content: Maybe just give up? Use your imagination?

222011011.content: I will heed your advice for the time being. At least we have pondered the question together.

222011012.content: Tell me, do you too have a "magnificent view" kept in your heart?

222011014.content: The mountain cannot be seen from its foot; the water cannot be felt from the boat. And so, I gradually find myself confined to an illusion, captured by a facade...

222011015.content: Tell me this—If you too were to find yourself in this ephemeral world, what would you do?

222011017.content: Lunch? If the bidders' conference finishes on time, yes.

222011019.content: There were so many things I craved as a kid that I never had the chance to try. It's time I made up for that.

222011020.content: Let's see... There's that famous grilled seafood restaurant, the Shashvat place on that old street corner, and there's Mr. Bai's noodle shop...

222011021.content: As her sister mutters in Yingzhao's ear, a Tian Lu Traders employee passes her a badge, which she hangs around her neck. She surveys the crowd filtering into the venue, then looks down to check the time.

222011022.content: How much are you planning to eat...?

222011023.content: I'm not sure you'll have the time. Is a morning long enough for your Quad missions?

222011024.content: It's just a few investigations. After more than three months of fieldwork with the others, this is nothing!

222011025.content: And you can't tell me about it, I guess?

222011027.content: But you can say where you're going, right? If you have to go somewhere really far away, it'll take you some time to get back to the city.

222011028.content: It's near Mount Xiaoyang. Ms. Zhiming issued me an aircraft, so I'll definitely make it in time.

222011029.content: Oh, wait! I wasn't supposed to say that... Hey, that thing you're bidding on, it's called "Songjade", isn't it?

222011031.content: Just a little curious. Xu Heng Geographic featured a study last week. It said that Songjade is a variant of Cloudsong Ore. That sounds worth studying.

222011032.content: But giving it a special name makes it sound kinda gimmicky...

222011033.content: Well, Cloudsong Ore is an industrial resource, while Songjade is a precious stone. It makes sense that they'd be called different things.

222011034.content: Oh, I get it. Rare things are more valuable, right? This is the first discovery of Songjade anywhere in the world, so it's possible that Nanjiao Isle has the only vein of it.

222011035.content: And the thing itself is pretty interesting. From what I hear, not only does it have practically no gravitational unstability, it also makes a nice sound.

222011036.content: Right, that's where it gets its name, Songjade. Plus, that smooth surface and beautiful color make it a highly sought-after material in accessory making.

222011037.content: Do you remember the old artisan that used to help us out when we were kids? He lives near Mount Xiaoyang now, and I think he made a batch of jewelry using Songjade. We could go and ask if he has any stock left, if you're interested.

222011039.content: Their conversation is interrupted by an announcement blaring so loudly on Yingzhao's side that even Linyu can hear each word at the other end.

222011040.content: Ladies and gentlemen, the bidders' conference will begin in 15 minutes. Please follow the signs to your places...

222011041.content: And now, for an overview of today's agenda...

222011042.content: So loud. Are you starting now?

222011043.content: Soon. Tell me what you want for lunch first, but you only get to pick one place.

222011044.content: Then... let's go see if that bun shop is still there.

222011045.content: You mean that cheap spot we always used to go to as kids? The one that gave us free soy milk?

222011046.content: This is a rare occasion, we can do better than that.

222011047.content: That place is plenty good! Just talking about it is making me hungry.

222011048.content: I haven't tried any of the stuff I talked about just now. The more I think about, it's the buns we ate as kids that impressed me the most.

222011049.content: Even though I can eat my fill every day now and buns aren't anything special to me anymore, I guess nothing can beat that satisfied feeling they gave me back then.

222011051.content: The call ends, and Yingzhao shakes her head with a smile. Who would have guessed her sister's request would be so simple?

222011052.content: But her expression quickly regains its composure. People stream in through the main entrance as the announcement continues. The next matter is too delicate to tackle with lunch on the brain.

222011053.content: ...The city's "Yang Valley Songjade Mineral Development Project" is now moving into the local referendum phase in accordance with regulations such as the Xu Heng Unfair Competition Law, the Nanjiao Isle Mineral Resource Management Regulations, and Xu Heng Public Voting Law...

222011054.content: The purpose of this bid is to solicit resource integration and technology upgrade proposals for the city's mining industry in order to solve the technical difficulties and lack of intrinsic motivation hindering the old workshops' transformation. The focus of this conference will be for the public in attendance to vote on the best proposal and project organizer.

222011055.content: Participating in this bid, we have Tian Lu Traders, Nanjiao San Ding Urban Construction Investment Company of San Ding Group, Ziyun Mining...

222011056.content: Yingzhao already knows the matters pertaining to the bidders' conference like the back of her hand. She knows the names of all her competitors by heart, but only one is worth paying any attention to:

222011057.content: "San Ding," or rather, the San Ding Group behind it.

222011058.content: Standing before the venue doors, Yingzhao looks down at the long-prepared electronic proposal in her hands and lets out a soft sigh.

222011059.content: Such an established group. First, they contracted the mountain in the name of development, then they announced the discovery of Songjade and their plan to turn the scenic area into a mine. They clearly think that vein's already in their pocket.

222011060.content: If we go by the polls, our chance of winning is...

222011061.content: Chance of winning what? Do tell. I can help.

222011062.content: ...Deputy Mengzhang? What are you doing here?

222011063.content: I came to see what all the fuss is about. What a pleasant surprise to see a familiar face.

222011064.content: The smiling youth before Yingzhao straightens up, regarding the file in her hands with interest.

222011065.content: Oh? The Songjade bid event. I see that Tian Lu Traders is looking to new horizons. The demand for this stuff has been so high lately that prices are through the roof.

222011066.content: Let me see... Ah, yes, you'll have to contend with San Ding Group. That certainly won't be easy. Tian Lu Traders may be growing quickly, but overtake an established group like that? You'll need a decade, at least.

222011067.content: I've had enough cold water thrown on me these last few days, thank you... But the boss thinks it's feasible, so we should still have a chance.

222011068.content: That Luliang's full of ideas. She didn't give you any tricks to tuck up your sleeve?

222011069.content: No, she didn't... The conference is about to start, are you coming?

222011070.content: Oh, no. I have urgent business here on Nanjiao Isle. Taking a peek at the fuss is one thing, but wading into it is another entirely.

222011071.content:
I wish Tian Lu Traders every success.
If you'll excuse me.

222011072.content: By the time Yingzhao looks back up again, Mengzhang has already disappeared into the bustling crowd.

222011073.content: Just then, another figure squeezes their way through the crowd. Standing before Yingzhao is a young man in Tian Lu Traders uniform—Yingzhao's trusty helper.

222011074.content: Ying—Wait, sorry... Boss! We've been called up.

222011076.content: Composing herself, Yingzhao organizes her thoughts and enters the building with her subordinate.

222011079.content: The conference was over, yet rather than disperse, a large crowd remained gathered in the entrance hall. Someone gives a shout upon seeing Yingzhao emerge and the crowd rushes toward her.

222011080.content: What's going on? Who are these people?

222011081.content: You don't know? They're all small business owners in the ore trade.

222011082.content: Big corporates have grown so quickly over the last two years that they're edging out the small businesses. I hear there's been a transformation plan in the pipeline for a while.

222011083.content: San Ding Group happens to have an interest in Songjade ore, and this bidders' conference is to get a sense of where everyone's at. If San Ding gets the most support to lead the project, it'll be bad news for those small businesses...

222011084.content: The small business owners hear all this, but they can't blame the passersby for their comments. After all, to the general populace, businesses rise and fall like the tides.

222011085.content: But they haven't lost all hope yet. They look to Yingzhao, hoping to hear a sufficiently uplifting response until they realize that her cool, inscrutable expression hasn't changed.

222011086.content: Those are the rules, there's no negotiating them. San Ding won the bid.

222011087.content: Then, what about the ownership of the Songjade mine?

222011088.content: San Ding is the contractor developing Mount Xiaoyang. They were always going to be given first priority.

222011089.content: There's only one mining permit to go around. Evaluation of San Ding's credentials has already begun.

222011091.content: ...I'm sorry. After all that time you all put into working with Tian Lu Traders on the industrial park and downstream industrial expansion project, I wish I had better news for you.

222011092.content: Bowing softly before the gathered business owners in apology, a barely audible sigh escapes Yingzhao's lips.

222011093.content: I still can't understand it... Does this mean that everyone actually chose to abandon our workshops and hand the business over to San Ding?

222011094.content: It wasn't easy getting back on track after the Cloudsong Crisis. We even never downsized under the pressure of the prospecting and transport costs of surface mining. And now they're kicking us to the curb like this...

222011095.content: It's gotta be a conspiracy, right?! Who knows how many people will be out of work if San Ding does this! Why would anyone back them?

222011096.content: Bidding plans take a number of considerations into account. In terms of technology and capital, San Ding do have the advantage...

222011097.content: Capital! Exactly! I'm willing to bet they let all that money of theirs do the talking so they could get their hands on that Songjade mine!

222011098.content: Making wild speculations about people behind their backs, are we? Really now, I'm a little disappointed.

222011099.content: Yingzhao is interrupted by another voice. A figure wearing a courteous smile, belying the arrogance underneath, struts into the center of the crowd.

222011100.content: I am Shoumo, representative of San Ding Group. I believe we all met during the meeting.

222011101.content: The votes were cast and the people have spoken. It was an above-board competition, so I'll thank you all not to start rumors to the contrary.

222011102.content: Representative Shoumo. These business owners have been operating on Nanjiao Isle for many years. No one knows the environment better than they do.

222011103.content: San Ding's co-operating proposal has already won support from the upstream and downstream industries. Haven't you considered cooperating with your colleagues from the same industry?

222011105.content: You... You think you're better than all of us?!

222011106.content: San Ding could achieve your combined output for a fifth of the cost. What need is there for us to cooperate? With all due respect, little workshops like yours are already running on borrowed time.

222011107.content: The future of this industry is technology-intensive scaled production and integrated strategic management. San Ding has already implemented these advancements in Meigu zone, Yu Jing, and even Neuhansa with tremendous success.

222011108.content: Nanjiao Isle's economic model is lagging so far behind that your workshops aren't even worth preserving. It's no wonder that an unrealistic and naive project like Tian Lu Traders' couldn't garner any support.

222011109.content: We've already planned out our transformation with Representative Yingzhao. We'll still be in the running with or without San Ding.

222011110.content: Besides, what you said are nothing but just some lofty words for someone gunning for Songjade's potential profit.

222011111.content: Yes. You are absolutely correct. San Ding does intend to make a profit. Is that a problem?

222011112.content: What kind of business aims for a loss? Ha. You can ask Representative Yingzhao if Tian Lu Traders is here on a charity mission.

222011113.content: That mine belongs to Nanjiao Isle! San Ding has no right to exploit it!

222011114.content: If it weren't for San Ding, you wouldn't even know of Songjade's existence. It pains me to think of such a precious resource going untapped like that.

222011115.content: The bidding progressed according to the will of the people of Nanjiao Isle and the rules of market competition. It's time to accept it.

222011116.content: The public supports San Ding. It's the right direction for the world. The technological revolution San Ding is bringing will separate the wheat from the chaff, and the people will thank us for it. The sooner you understand that, the better.

222011117.content: Shoumo sneers, making no effort to downplay the piousness in his voice. With that, he leaves with his hands behind his back and his retinue in tow.

222011118.content: What a *Xu Heng Slang*! I can't believe I didn't think to record his *Xu Heng Slang* mug just now!

222011119.content: The others seem to want to chime in, but Yingzhao gently raises her hand to stop them.

222011120.content: He was right about one thing: This will separate the wheat from the chaff. Regardless of San Ding's prestige or influence, Nanjiao Isle surely wants what's best for its economic development.

222011122.content: Thank you all for placing your trust in me. I still believe in our project, and I also believe that, in the long term, taking a localized approach and maintaining competition and cooperation are in the best interests of Nanjiao Isle's mining industry.

222011123.content: The winner may have already been chosen, but there's still the five-day deliberation period. If we can find a strong enough backer for our project in that time, we'll still have a chance to raise an objection.

222011124.content: Alright, we're in! We'll do whatever we can to help!

222011125.content: That's right! Thank you, Representative Yingzhao!

222011126.content: After saying her goodbyes to everyone, Yingzhao walks along the Nanjiao Plaza footpath alone. Only then does she finally relax, rubbing her brow wearily.

222011127.content: Are we stagnating? I guess the people share San Ding's view of us...

222011128.content: Out of our depth, beneficiaries of the status quo, idealists...

222011129.content: The public bidding created quite the stir, with comments pouring in online too. Yingzhao casually scrolls through the groundless accusations, but quickly loses the desire to continue.

222011130.content: Just then, the sound of an incoming call cuts through her thoughts. Seeing Linyu's name in the terminal, Yingzhao's expression softens as she answers.

222011132.content: But there is no response. Before Yingzhao can finish speaking, a loud noise booms in her ears.

222011134.content: Yingzhao! Come to Mount Xiaoyang, quick! There's—

222011135.content: Linyu's voice begins to distort until all Yingzhao can hear is fragmented murmurs. Her pupils narrow.

222011136.content: Yingzhao, I've put everything away and we can get going soo... Huh?

222011138.content: Her subordinate runs up behind her, but by the time he opens his mouth, Yingzhao has already vanished like a passing breeze.

222021001.content: After splitting the AGI Mecha behind her in two, Yingzhao looks around at the mechanical debris strewn about the mountain path. Her brows furrow.

222021002.content: Ambushed by a gang of AGI Mecha at the foot of Mount Xiaoyang and still unable to reach Linyu, Yingzhao feels a little agitated and unsettling. But she still notices something strange about the would-be roadblocks.

222021003.content: What are AGI Mechas doing on Mount Xiaoyang...?

222021004.content: ...They look like they're of Neuhansan make. Were they left behind by the previous prospecting team?

222021005.content: Rich in minerals, the Yang mountain region was a mine before the Cloudsong Crisis. After that, routine mineral extraction was banned to ensure the floating island's geological structure remained stable. The AGI Mecha must be left over from that period.

222021006.content: Yingzhao removes the protective cover from one of the AGI Mechas and checks the information inside.

222021007.content: Just as I thought, this is an old model—more than 20 years old.

222021008.content: Their functional structures must be damaged by now. Why would they attack me?

222021009.content: She carefully inspects the rest of the mecha.

222021010.content: Bane Energy marks... Could Bane Energy influence an AGI Mecha's operations program?

222021012.content: Just how many of these piles of scrap metal are going to reactivate...

222021013.content: ...I'll wrap this up quickly, I need to find Linyu.

222022002.content: Yingzhao calls and calls, but there's still no answer. All of a sudden, she hears fighting and bolts in the direction of the noise.

222022003.content: The misty mountain trail turns a corner, and the shady trees give way to a clearing strewn with AGI Mecha detritus. In the center stands a girl gripping a long sword, while Linyu lies unconscious against a boulder nearby.

222022006.content: The girl instinctively raises her sword, and clusters of fire flare out from its blade.

222022007.content: Sensing the waves of Divine Power emanating from the strange girl, Yingzhao sighs with relief. She then rushes over to Linyu, propping her up by the shoulders to check her condition.

222022008.content: You're a friend of hers? That's great. I was worried about her.

222022010.content: The Quad? I've never heard of that sect.

222022011.content: I am the true disciple of the Astral Arcanum of Ruomu Palace on Mount Dayang—Jinwu the Sun Chaser! I have descended the mountain to train by protecting the people from turmoil and wiping Yaoguai off every corner of the world!

222022013.content: Yingzhao stares as the girl named Jinwu stands brimming with confidence, arms akimbo. From the side, Linyu palms her forehead in what could either be embarrassment or weakness from her injuries.

222022014.content: As I was patrolling the mountain today, I saw a horde of these iron-skinned Yaoguai surround, attacking this young lady. As a champion of justice and defender of the vulnerable, I made quick work of them!

222022015.content: Yaoguai... Do you mean these AGI Mecha?

222022016.content: AGI Mecha? What's that? Yaoguai are Yaoguai!

222022017.content: Do you know what happened to Linyu?

222022018.content: She must have been infected by that evil aura. But don't worry—I examined her, she's going to be okay.

222022019.content: This offbeat Modifier seems more than a little out of the loop, but with Linyu injured, Yingzhao has no time for questions. Getting her sister to a safe place is her immediate priority.

222022020.content: I'll take Linyu down the mountain first. Sun Cha... Jinwu, you're with me.

222022021.content: Huh? Are you inviting me to train with you? Okay! But wait a minute... I don't even know your name.

222022022.content: Yingzhao. I work at Tian Lu Traders. This is Linyu, my sister.

222022023.content: Tian Lu Traders... I didn't realize there were so many other sects in the outside world.

222022024.content: ...We should get going while we still can.

222022025.content: At the foot of Mount Xiaoyang, Yingzhao finds a workshop and settles Linyu in the guest room. When all is said and done, an hour has passed.

222022026.content: According to Jinwu's account, Linyu seemed to lose consciousness after taking a chain of explosive hits from the AGI Mecha. Having confirmed that her sister only passed out, Yingzhao relaxes slightly.

222022027.content: That's more or less the situation... I really appreciate your help.

222022028.content: Ah, it's nothing. Just take your time and rest here.

222022029.content: You two little girls have grown so much in just the blink of an eye. Heh heh, it's good to see you again.

222022030.content: I'm sorry that we never repaid you for the kindness you showed us back then.

222022031.content: You've sent me Yu Jing specialties every new year. What's there to be sorry about?

222022032.content: When Linyu wakes up, you should give her a good talking to. The mountain's been too unsettled lately to go wandering around there on your own.

222022034.content: That's right. They say a strange cold wind blows and shadows dart about the place. Many who go up the mountain wake up from nightmares in a cold sweat once they're back in their beds. It's bizarre, all right.

222022035.content: If you have nowhere else to go, you're welcome to stay here with me. A little workshop out here in the boonies with no customers. No one will bother you anyway.

222022036.content: Speaking of this, I thought it seemed a little quiet on my way here. There aren't any factories in operation nearby... Has business been poor lately?

222022037.content: Hey now, have you forgotten what my business is? I saw the broadcast of that bid of yours today. Watched it start to finish.

222022038.content: Now that the big companies are moving in, it's time for us old fuddy-duddies to pack up and leave.

222022039.content: ...I'm sorry, we should have been better prepared. Don't worry, we're going to think of something as soon as we can.

222022040.content: It's fine if you youngsters want to make a go of it, but I'm pushing 70 now. It's all small potatoes to me at this point, nothing I need to concern myself with.

222022041.content: You know, that Shoumo invited us out to see their factory... We just can't compete with something like that.

222022042.content: Hundreds of assembly lines and loads of advanced technology and AGI Mecha. That ore is dug out of the ground and made into a finished product before you can say "boo!"

222022043.content: And to be honest, who in our line of work wouldn't envy that level of efficiency? Technology is advancing too quickly for us to keep up...

222022044.content: As the two carry on chatting, Jinwu looks curiously around the workshop. Though itching to touch some of the old machines, she manages to stay her hand with great restraint, then stops before a towering bookcase at last.

222022045.content: You sure have a lot of books here, mister. Can I take a look?

222022047.content: "Advanced Machine Tool Maintenance," "Post-Farrowing Sow Care," "Real Estate Purchase Agreement..."

222022048.content: Huh? What's a "machine tool...?" And what's "real estate?"

222022049.content: This last word immediately catches Yingzhao's attention. She stands up and watches as Jinwu takes down what is clearly a sales agreement from the shelf.

222022050.content: Are you... planning to sell the workshop?

222022051.content: Heh heh. Well, I'm looking into it.

222022052.content: But you've been here for decades. Why would you want to sell this place...?

222022053.content: Ha ha. I'm just not much of a nostalgic type, you see. And these old machines haven't got much job to do lately.

222022054.content: Nowadays, I just whip up whatever doodads I can sell to keep me fed. I might as well find a farm and enjoy my retirement there.

222022055.content: Once the big factory's been built, shabby little workshops like ours will just be taking up space. What difference does it make if I sell now or later?

222022056.content: With Linyu showing no signs of waking up anytime soon, Jinwu goes quiet as she holds the books in her arms.

222022057.content: After chatting more with the old artisan about life and the business, Yingzhao realizes that the small workshop owners from the bidders' conference don't actually have it so bad. At the very least, they have some fight in them.

222022058.content: Tian Lu Traders has made good money from Cloudsong Ore the last few years. My advice? Cut your losses, there's no need to waste more time with San Ding.

222022059.content: The ore business around the mountain is dead, and in other places it's on its last legs. There's nothing we can do.

222022060.content: It's not all about profit... Even a predatory intervention like San Ding's will breathe some life back into Nanjiao Isle's mining industry in the short term.

222022061.content: But they're only cooperating with the up- and downstream, unwilling to give anyone else a piece of the pie. This is dangerous. If they withdraw someday, the industry will collapse.

222022062.content: Tian Lu Traders' plan isn't perfect, of course, but at least it could help get everyone on solid ground and find a more suitable niche for Nanjiao Isle.

222022063.content: To make an honest living, you have to set your own terms. Fleeting success from under someone else's heel won't give you lasting peace of mind.

222022065.content: Five days isn't much time. I need to go and see how the households nearby are faring... I'll need all the support I can get.

222022066.content: Jinwu, I might not be back until much later. What's your plan?

222022067.content: Me? I... I'll stay here with Linyu.

222022069.content: Even in the short time they've been acquainted, Yingzhao can tell that Jinwu is the pure and simple type. Plus, she's a Modifier as well. Yingzhao bids farewell to the old artisan without hesitation, and hurries off toward the city.

222031001.content: By the time Yingzhao has made rounds to all the nearby workshops and is preparing to turn back, it's nearly 10:00 PM.

222031002.content: As the last of the five isles to see the start of urban construction, Nanjiao Isle's infrastructure is all pretty much brand-new. This nascent city, however, is currently contending with the pains of transformation.

222031003.content: Lots of heavy-duty equipment is needed for mining and metallurgy. With the surface now off-limits to homes, costs of transportation and maintenance will skyrocket.

222031004.content: Small enterprises have a low risk tolerance and weak pricing power. Even if they all came together through a division of labor, they'd still be at a disadvantage against external competition.

222031005.content: And then there's the matter of Songjade...

222031006.content: Lost in thought and bewilderment, Yingzhao's normally quick pace slows as she walks along the street.

222031007.content: Signs of human life grow sparse as Yingzhao nears the outskirts of the city. Suddenly, an odd figure by the side of the road catches her attention—it's an old woman in front of an easel.

222031008.content: I feel like... I've seen this scene before.

222031009.content: The feeling of déjà vu is so intense that she can't help but go over for a closer look. What she sees when she glances at the woman's painting, however, sends her into shock.

222031010.content: Yingzhao is instantly captivated by the magnificent images filling the canvas. A large white moon hangs in the sky, but reflected in the water below is a gleaming sun. In the distance, an endless chain of mountains clad in lush greenery, piercing through the clouds.

222031011.content: It looks strange and incomprehensible, doesn't it?

222031012.content: Yes, but... I think that's beautiful.

222031013.content: You don't think it's strange? Why would the moon be reflected as the sun in the water?

222031014.content: It doesn't look at all realistic, does it?

222031015.content: "Unrealistic and naive..." Yingzhao shakes her head with a bitter smile on her face as she recalls Shoumo's earlier critique of her project.

222031016.content: ...No, it looks like something that would never happen in real life.

222031017.content: The sun and the moon are different... Everyone knows that from seeing the sky every day. So, how could the moon be reflected as the sun?

222031019.content: My painting here is like the myths and legends around our world—mostly false, unrealistic flights of fancy.

222031020.content: But can their significance be negated with a simple word like "unrealistic?"

222031021.content: Without waiting for Yingzhao to take the rest of the scene in, the old woman rises and begins packing away her easel.

222031022.content: Yingzhao watches as she rolls up the painting. As that bizarre, fantastic scene disappears from view, Yingzhao is surprised to find herself struck with a sense of loss.

222031023.content: When I paint, there's no sun, moon, mountains, or rivers. I just paint what's in my heart, nothing more.

222031024.content: What sort of "painting" do you have in your heart, I wonder?

222031025.content: By the time Yingzhao snaps out of her thoughts, the woman is long gone.

222031026.content: Her conversation with the old woman seems to disentangle one thought from the chaos in Yingzhao's mind—though not enough to solve the problem at hand yet.

222031027.content: ...I should see if any bun shops are still open.

222031028.content: Oh! I had no idea you could get something this tasty off the mountain! The aroma alone could defeat me handily!

222031029.content: If Linyu hasn't woken up yet, could you take these into her room? She's been craving buns since this morning.

222031030.content: Leave it to me! So, this is the delicacy Linyu had her heart set on! She has good taste, if I do say so myself. No wonder we hit it off right away...

222031031.content: Jinwu glances curiously between Yingzhao and the old artisan. Noticing the tension that seems to have formed between them, she takes the buns from Yingzhao and brings them into Linyu's room, then closes the door behind her.

222031032.content: If you don't mind, there's something I need to ask you.

222031034.content: San Ding insists they discovered the Songjade ore when they were surveying Mount Xiaoyang. But mining has always been a traditional industry in Nanjiao Isle, San Ding acting faster than anyone else is highly unusual.

222031035.content: I heard that a good few of the workshop owners in the ore business around Mount Xiaoyang have gone there to dig for Songjade.

222031036.content: I was told that people already knew the existence of Songjade mine before San Ding got the rights to develop the land. There were even people who had submitted a mining application...

222031038.content: So, what really happened? What made you give up like that?

222031039.content: Yingzhao regards the old man with a complex expression. As her and Linyu's former benefactor, Yingzhao had always held him in high esteem.

222031040.content: When she heard for the first time of how the old artisan had given up on the Songjade mine and his livelihood of his own accord, Yingzhao could barely make sense of it.

222031041.content: But as she calmed down on the way back, a reasonable guess—one informed by her many years of experience in the business world—gradually came to her.

222031044.content: Enough to buy a house in Yu Jing, build a small farm, and retire.

222031045.content: But the mining rights are worth much more than that... No, wait—San Ding is the one that drove up the price of Songjade. Did they threaten you with price pressure?

222031046.content: What could I do? It's their market. Songjade was hardly worth a thing when it was first discovered.

222031047.content: On the first day, someone from San Ding came to see me. On the second day, they drove up the price of Songjade. On the third day, they came to see me again and told me that the market price for such a precious stone was theirs to set as they pleased.

222031048.content: I don't know a thing about speculation and branding and all that hooey... I didn't stand a chance against them.

222031049.content: Everyone says you live a plain and simple life... Was it really just about the money?

222031050.content: In a world like this, it's all about money, isn't it?

222031051.content: ...As you may remember, I have a son. He majored in automation. He left Nanjiao Isle long ago to study and work in Yu Jing... After he graduated, he found work as a service engineer.

222031053.content: Well, at the end of last year, he was given a project—on-site AGI Mecha maintenance. What he didn't know was that the project was shady like you wouldn't believe, like using faulty products.

222031054.content: An alloy beam fell from a damaged AGI Mecha and smashed his leg.

222031056.content: That bonehead got hoodwinked. He didn't have the experience to know any better. The salary was high, but the contract was full of traps. The moment something went wrong, they turned on him and denied responsibility.

222031057.content: We fought for half a year, but two lawsuits later, all he got was a little compensation. After that, he took out a number of loans until he could just scrape together enough money for a prosthetic limb.

222031058.content: My boy's almost 40 now. He never married, he's in a mountain of debt, and with the condition he's in, he just suffers through each day... What father could bear to see their child go through all that?

222031059.content: I'm sorry, I was wrong to ask...

222031060.content: Not at all. I'm the one who should apologize.

222031062.content: I had no idea at the time just how big San Ding's appetite is: to use this opportunity to take over Nanjiao Isle's mineral industry.

222031063.content: We wouldn't be in this mess if I'd turned down their offer.

222031064.content: Please don't say that. In all Tian Lu Traders' dealings with San Ding, one thing has been abundantly clear: They want a monopoly.

222031065.content: They have their eye on Songjade, and they would have found a way in whether you accepted their terms or not.

222031066.content: Since you've already come to an agreement with them, just take the money and try to enjoy a better life.

222031067.content: The money? I haven't seen a penny of that yet. That Shoumo told me I'd have to wait until they officially obtained their mining permit.

222031068.content: Bah, to make me keep my mouth shut so I can't spoil their plans, I imagine.

222031069.content: If that's the case, then why have you told me all this...?

222031070.content: You said it yourself before you left this morning: "To make an honest living, you have to set your own terms."

222031071.content: I gave it a lot of thought, and you're right.

222031072.content: You Tian Lu Traders folks really do know your stuff. I'll find no peace of mind in my retirement if it means watching my associates suffer.

222031073.content: Tian Lu Traders has always been saying that it wants prosperity for everyone. People may see that as just a lofty slogan, but I can tell that you mean it.

222031074.content: That's the greatest endorsement we could ask for. Thank you.

222031075.content: There's no need to thank me, I'm just speaking the truth. I should have realized what San Ding was playing at sooner.

222031076.content: They've gone through the formalities within the law, and the agreement's all signed. What can we do now?

222031077.content: Sometimes the truth is more important than the outcome. Besides, our fates aren't set in stone yet.

222031078.content: Yingzhao lowers her head in thought. Having witnessed Luliang's preternatural business acumen over the last ten plus years, Yingzhao does not believe her boss would send her here just to spite her.

222031079.content: I know I'm missing something, but what...?

222031080.content: Looking back on the day's itinerary—the meeting, looking for Linyu, visiting the workshop owners, learning about the old artisan's bitter story...

222031081.content: (The Songjade mine is in Mount Xiaoyang. Linyu happened to go to Mount Xiaoyang on a mission, and that's when she was ambushed by the AGI Mecha... This couldn't really all just be a coincidence, could it?)

222031082.content: (Mount Xiaoyang, Mount Xiaoyang... AGI Mecha, Bane Energy... Right.)

222031083.content: Yingzhao blinks, seemingly noticing something important. She looks up at the perplexed old man.

222031084.content: Earlier today, you said that the mountain had become "unsettled." Could you be a little more specific?

222031085.content: Hey, now. Talking about San Ding is one thing, why bring up something even more sinister?

222031086.content: I already told you, there are ghosts up there. Stay away from that place. Did you even listen to me?

222031087.content: If there really are ghosts, San Ding would have discovered them during their on-site survey. Otherwise, wouldn't they just be asking for trouble by going ahead with the development?

222031088.content: Who says they're not? I accepted San Ding's conditions for two reasons: they offered a fair price, and that place is cursed anyway.

222031089.content: I've seen it firsthand. When I first discovered the Songjade, I got a few pals together to dig it up with me.

222031090.content: In the end, a bunch of them passed out for no reason. When Old Xing from next door woke up, he was acting like a man possessed. Kept going on about there being monsters. He only recovered after going to Vermilion Wellness.

222031091.content: Vermilion Wellness? Deputy Lingguang's place...? Just a moment, I need to contact my boss.

222031092.content: Yingzhao's mouth is agape, as if she's come to a sudden realization. She sequesters herself in the artisan's study to call Luliang.

222031093.content: What's the matter, can't sleep? Calling me to vent at this hour?

222031094.content: Based on your usual schedule, it's still hours before your bedtime... I'll tell you about the bid later.

222031095.content: Did you know that Linyu went to Mount Xiaoyang on a mission?

222031096.content: I did. Haven't you two already met up by now?

222031097.content: She was attacked by AGI Mecha and passed out from her injuries.

222031099.content: Is something happening on Mount Xiaoyang? Did Linyu's mission have anything to do with the Songjade?

222031100.content: Tch... Give me a couple minutes.

222031101.content: Luliang seems to cut off the call for a moment. Yingzhao waits quietly for two minutes, and as scheduled, Luliang's voice returns.

222031104.content: Well, here's the thing... Uh, Lingguang recently took in a few patients from the Mount Xiaoyang area. She was thinking there might be something foul in the mountain.

222031105.content: The Quad didn't want any outsiders going to Mount Xiaoyang before they got a read on the situation. But then San Ding started eyeing the Songjade, so I proposed an idea to the Quad.

222031106.content: First, if Tian Lu Traders could get the rights to Mount Xiaoyang, there'd be money to be made. Second, it would enable us to seal off the mountain to investigate. Plus, going through the bid process wouldn't disrupt the market. Three birds with one stone.

222031107.content: Why didn't you tell me all this before?

222031108.content: Modifier matters are for Modifiers, business is for businesspeople. If you went to the bid on a mission to stop San Ding, wouldn't that have been inappropriate?

222031109.content: If everything's normal on Mount Xiaoyang, then we lose. There's no excuse for being outclassed. But Linyu got hurt, so I'm afraid something really is wrong.

222031110.content: I've never liked San Ding's high-handedness, but I'm not just going to watch them and miners go in there and get themselves killed...

222031111.content: Every time you start talking sense...

222031112.content: Correct, I have a chore for you to do!

222031113.content: I've briefed the Quad on the situation. Since you just so happen to be on Mount Xiaoyang, go ahead and take the lead for me, head butler. I'll double your travel reimbursement.

222031114.content: I can investigate. But what about our cooperation with the workshop owners?

222031115.content: The hard part's finished now that the bid's over. A seven-point difference is way better than I was expecting.

222031116.content: Didn't you bring a few assistants with you? Let them handle the rest.

222031117.content: Is that really okay? The deliberation period is just five days, and this is San Ding we're dealing with...

222031118.content: Don't worry about that. You didn't spend three days holed up working on the project just to compete with San Ding, now did you?

222031119.content: "Why did I come all the way to Nanjiao Isle with the project?" Yingzhao's eyes flit slightly as a number of images flash through her mind.

222031120.content: The days and nights studying Nanjiao Isle's mining industry and drawing up the bid proposal, the factories and machinery lying neglected on the outskirts of the city, the resignation on the faces of the workshop owners...

222031121.content: When I paint, there's no sun, moon, mountains, or rivers. I just paint what's in my heart, nothing more.

222031122.content: What sort of "painting" do you have in your heart, I wonder?

222031123.content: ...I see. I'll have my assistants go ahead with the industrial park and resource integration plan. Leave the mountain to me.

222031124.content: If San Ding is still going to stand in our way of supporting everyone's businesses, so be it.

222031125.content: The money, however, is a trickier problem to solve. The workshop owners' cash flows are leaner than expected. I have an idea, but I'll need your help...

222031126.content: Five minutes later, Yingzhao has ended her call with Luliang. She finds the old artisan still sighing to himself.

222031127.content: You said before that you had a few Songjade accessories on hand. Do you still have them?

222031128.content: I do, I do... San Ding couldn't very well rob us of the ore we dug up ourselves.

222031129.content: Tian Lu Traders isn't thinking of going up against San Ding with my little bit of inventory? The mine's in their hands now. What use will those trinkets be?

222031130.content: Don't worry, we're certainly not going to use it to fight for market share. It's just that, thanks to San Ding, the price of Songjade is sky-high at the moment. This is the perfect time to recoup some funds.

222031131.content: Setting up an industrial park isn't cheap. Money wouldn't be an issue if we'd gotten the Songjade mine... but luckily for us, the workshops all have some Songjade reserves. All together, it should be enough.

222031132.content: But San Ding calls the shots on the price...

222031133.content: As a business partner, Tian Lu Traders is supposed to help everyone expand sales channels. San Ding may be overbearing, but there are still limits to what they can do.

222031134.content: A jeweler's over in Yu Jing recently lost out on an order due to lack of stock. They're looking for suppliers, and they've offered a decent price for Songjade.

222031135.content: If everyone can get in on this deal together, we should make enough to cover the startup costs. Then, the project we discussed can go ahead as planned... Here, these are the design drawings.

222031136.content: Let me see... Oh, very nice. A tiger's body, a lion's head, and a long, branching tail—that's a Zouyu. And this one... If memory serves, this is Miyakozuru, the auspicious crane?
