222031137.content: That's right. I'm not sure about the specifics, but there's been a huge demand in the Sasanami market lately for amulets and accessories with various auspicious motifs.

222031138.content: The auspicious crane is a symbol of Sasanami, so there's quite a lot of demand for this sort of thing.

222031139.content: Hehehe... There's disruption everywhere these days. As I recall, the last time there was a surge in orders for amulets was before the Cloudsong Crisis. Earthquakes were getting more and more frequent back then.

222031140.content: I was just an apprentice still learning the craft at the time... Hehe, but enough about that.

222031141.content: It's a fairly simple design. If I start now, I should have it ready before daybreak. But what about the other workshops? We'll need their help too if this is going to work.

222031142.content: With San Ding clamping down on everyone like this, I don't think convincing them will be a challenge.

222031143.content: Yingzhao shakes her head with a smile. A door opens behind her, and she turns to see Jinwu's head poking out from the guest room, her hand beckoning excitedly.

222031145.content: Yingzhao enters the room, where Linyu is already sitting up in bed.

222031146.content: Sis! I... I think I messed up.

222031147.content: Hush now, I know about the mission. I'm just glad you're okay.

222031148.content: But we said we'd find somewhere to eat together...

222031149.content: Yingzhao shoots Jinwu a glance, and Jinwu hurriedly hands Linyu a half-shriveled paper bag from the table.

222031150.content: I only ate two! I didn't take Linyu's, I promise.

222031151.content: Here you go, Linyu. Yingzhao got these for you, and I kept them warm!

222031153.content: Linyu takes the bag. The buns inside are still piping hot. Stunned, Linyu looks at Jinwu and realizes that she's radiating with a fiery Divine Power.

222031154.content: Speaking of which, who are you...?

222031155.content: Ahem! I am the true disciple of the Astral Arcanum of Ruomu Palace—Jinwu the Sun Chaser!

222031156.content: I descended the mountain on my master's orders to train and protect—Mmf!

222031157.content: Her name is Jinwu, she's a Modifier like us. She's the one who rescued you.

222031158.content: Is that so... Thank you, Jinwu.

222031159.content: Yingzhao! How could you interrupt my self-introduction?

222031160.content: I don't want you to mislead Linyu.

222031161.content: Yingzhao removes her hand from Jinwu's mouth, then looks with concern at her sister.

222031163.content: Weak, and a little woozy... Oh, right! Yingzhao, the mine!

222031165.content: I picked up signs of Bane Energy deep in an old mine in the mountain. But I lost my scanner in there... There's definitely Visbane activity!

222031166.content: Do you mean the AGI Mecha? When Jinwu and I found you yesterday, we ran into some AGI Mecha corrupted by Bane Energy.

222031167.content: No, the AGI Mecha were nothing... I found a strange area deep in the mine. I don't know how to describe it, but it was like I was in a completely different space.

222031168.content: After I stumbled in there, I saw Visbanes I'd never seen before.

222031169.content: That space... Do you remember where you found it exactly?

222031170.content: Yingzhao opens a holographic map on her terminal. Linyu scrutinizes it for a while, then finally marks a location.

222031171.content: Here. Even from far away, I got chills when I saw those Visbanes. They saw me too, but thankfully, they didn't come after me. It was like they were trapped there by something.

222031173.content: I know this one! It's a kind of barrier technique. My master's great at those!

222031174.content: That description alone doesn't tell me anything. I'll have to go to the mountain and take a look.

222031175.content: The Quad's investigation task has been reassigned to me. I'll need to deal with whatever's happening in the mountain before San Ding begins the development.

222031176.content: Huh? You mean, vanquishing yaoguai and restoring peace to the land? I'm coming with you!

222031177.content: With that, Jinwu summons her Access Key. Startled, Yingzhao rushes to stop her, but she can see the determination in Jinwu's eyes.

222041001.content: Yingzhao and Jinwu rush along the mountain trail. It's midday, but the dense veil of mist enshrouding Mount Xiaoyang obscures their view.

222041002.content: The mountain is so much bigger than it looks from Ruomu Palace... I guess that's why the old poem goes, "The reason why one can't grasp the true nature of a mountain is because one is in the mountain oneself."

222041003.content: We've been walking all morning, and there's still no sign of the old mine Linyu was talking about. There's something very strange about this...

222041004.content: When we first met, you said you "descended the mountain to train." What did you mean by that?

222041005.content: My master told me I've already got a good handle on technique, but I haven't fully grasped what it truly means to be a warrior. So, I decided to descend the mountain and get further trained! I'm going to rid the world of evil using my own strength!

222041007.content: Yingzhao had only wanted to learn a little more about Jinwu, but Jinwu's peculiar way of speaking makes it difficult for her to glean any useful information.

222041008.content: It's normal to be confused about other sects! I've lived on Mount Dayang with my master ever since I was little, and we rarely got visitors. My master says that the secrets of Astral Arcanum aren't for outsiders to know.

222041009.content: Astral Arcanum...? Who is your master?

222041010.content: Master Xihe! She's the master of Ruomu Palace, and she's suuuper powerful! When it comes to barrier techniques, no one's better than my master!

222041011.content: And I'm her proudest disciple—Sun Chaser!

222041012.content: That sounds very... Wait a minute—

222041013.content: The sudden sound of an electronic voice coming from near the trail makes Yingzhao and Jinwu stop in their tracks.

222041014.content: The clinking and clanking of mechanical movements draws their attention to either side of the trail. Once almost indistinguishable from the mountain outcroppings, run-down AGI Mechas have suddenly roared back to life.

222041017.content: Oh! More of those iron-skinned Yaoguai!

222041019.content: Those things there! Those are the same type of Yaoguai that hurt Linyu. They definitely had something to do with her condition!

222041020.content: I see... So, Visbanes and AGI Mechas both count as "Yaoguai?"

222042001.content: After a brief skirmish, Yingzhao and Jinwu are back on their way, continuing to follow the misty path upwards.

222042003.content: As Jinwu raises a hand to her head, Yingzhao also comes to a stop, her brows knitted together. Their footsteps grow sluggish, as if they can't control their legs.

222042004.content: They can make out the faint outline of a mine deep in the mist, but the closer they get to it, the more overcome they feel by a strange light-headedness. It's so overpowering, it's as if their bodies are becoming one with the mountain fog.

222042006.content: I feel dizzy! Yingzhao, I must have trained too hard in my dreams last night...

222042007.content: Yingzhao is about to say something when she suddenly feels a weight pressing down on her shoulders. When she glances back, Jinwu is hanging from her like a sloth.

222042010.content: Yingzhao sighs somewhat helplessly. Not in great shape at the moment herself, she and Jinwu have no choice but to help each other over to a boulder by the side of the trail.

222042011.content: Let's rest for a bit. There's something strange about this place.

222042012.content: Mount Xiaoyang isn't even that tall, but it's constantly covered in mist. And then there's this strange dizziness... Maybe I should ask the Quad for a copy of the mountain's environmental monitoring records.

222042013.content: It seems like some sort of perceptual interference... But the strange thing is, I can just sense some Divine Power.

222042014.content: Maybe we're just hungry... Wait! I remember now!

222042015.content: Jinwu rises abruptly from her stupor, eyes aglow.

222042016.content: I've felt something like this before!

222042017.content: I was wandering around here in a daze one time when I found a medicinal herb. After I ate it, I felt fine!

222042019.content: Yingzhao looks at Jinwu skeptically, but Jinwu has already eagerly risen to her feet.

222042020.content: Hehe, come on! Let's look for some now!

222042023.content: Yingzhao looks up to see Jinwu walking over with several red flowers.

222042024.content: That's hibiscus, all right. But its only medicinal application is clearing heat and detoxication...

222042025.content: But it really did work that time! I was so hungry then that I ate a whole bunch of them. A little while later, I felt completely fine!

222042026.content: Jinwu pops some of the flowers into her mouth as she speaks, then hands Yingzhao one.

222042027.content: Just try it! It's not poisonous, I promise!

222042029.content: Could something as absurd as picking a few random flowers from the side of the road really work? With no other options at hand, Yingzhao follows Jinwu's lead and stuffs the petals into her mouth.

222042030.content: As she chews, a mild bitterness unfolds on her tongue that makes her brow furrow.

222042033.content: Eat some more then! You might feel better faster!

222042034.content: After eating a few more of the hibiscus flowers, Yingzhao suddenly realizes that her light-headedness really is starting to clear up. The bitter flavor of the petals seems to dissolve her earlier drowsiness and discomfort.

222042036.content: Hehe, see? I told you so.

222042037.content: Let's just say your gamble paid off... Anyway, what is this place? With Divine Power nearby, why did we still feel unwell?

222042038.content: There's a sinister aura mixed in with the primordial chaos here. It has to be Yaoguai, I'm sure of it. Identifying auras is what my Astral Arcanum does best.

222042039.content: Don't worry, Yingzhao—just leave any Yaoguai we encounter to my Tenblaze!

222042040.content: Those outside of Mount Xiaoyang are unaware of the situation unfolding in its depths. Back on the tumultuous front lines of commerce, everyone is busily gearing up to make a profit.

222042041.content: Shoumo has not taken a moment's rest since yesterday's bid. If he has a trump card, it's his prudence.

222042042.content: Having finished reading the electronic file before him, he finally rubs his brow, seemingly relieved, and sniggers self-assuredly.

222042043.content: San Ding isn't about to let anyone else get a piece of this pie.

222042044.content: That's it for those sorry little factories' orders? Just these two? 3,000 amulets in 15 days?

222042046.content: Hm... Looks like our friends in Yu Jing were right on the money.

222042047.content: Tian Lu Traders is still too green. The market is like a battlefield—fall behind, and you get trampled. Only a fool would believe that staying in their lane will get them anywhere.

222042048.content: They've got guts, but this is just disappointing. They'd have better luck trying to move mountains...

222042049.content: Yes, Mr. Shoumo, you are quite right...

222042050.content: How many days would we need for such a small quantity?

222042051.content: You know our production capabilities better than anyone, sir. One day would suffice.

222042052.content: That's too long. Have it ready to ship to Yu Jing by 3:00 tomorrow afternoon.

222042053.content: Yes, sir. I'll add another assembly line to the workshop.

222042054.content: Representative Shoumo, about that job for my son, do you think...

222042055.content: Yes, yes, I haven't forgotten. I'll have someone make the arrangements shortly. San Ding Group has always valued new talents—the younger, the better. If he proves useful, he'll get his chance to shine.

222042056.content: He stands up and escorts the nervous factory owner out. After some considered calculation, he makes a call...

222051001.content: Little is visible beyond the rolling fog, and all that can be heard in the cavernous mine is the echoing of two pairs of footsteps. A vague, suffocating pressure bears down on them, as if all of Yang Valley were submerged deep underwater.

222051002.content: After entering the region marked by Linyu, Yingzhao and Jinwu search along the foggy mountain for an hour. They don't run into any Visbanes, but they do pick up their trail.

222051003.content: I'm reading Bane Energy here, and it's only getting stronger... Linyu was right.

222051004.content: Somewhere around here has been badly corrupted by Bane Energy, but it's being suppressed by Divine Power. The source should be nearby...

222051005.content: Have some more hibiscus! I still have loads.

222051006.content: Yingzhao takes the flowers from Jinwu's hand. When she looks back, she notices a clanging sound coming from the large bag at Jinwu's waist.

222051007.content: What do you have in your bag?

222051008.content: Hehe, you can't punish the wicked on an empty stomach. I've got some beef jerky and loose tea—everything I need for my journey into the unknown.

222051009.content: And then I thought, what if I need to fight 300 rounds with a Yaoguai and need to spend the night on the mountain? So, I also brought some other essentials with me, like kitchen utensils, a knife, a big saw...

222051010.content:
Sounds like you're ready for a camping trip...
Hm? What's that?

222051011.content: They stop before a strange pile of stones.

222051012.content: There are inscriptions on these stones... They must have formed a stone monument before someone destroyed it.

222051015.content: This is the boundary tablet my master left... It all makes sense now!

222051016.content: The "Ruomu Tableau" my master talked about is right in front of us! And now I've finally seen it!

222051017.content: Jinwu lifts up one of the big slabs of stone for Yingzhao to see. The inscription on them is difficult to read, but Yingzhao can just make out the signature.

222051019.content: I get it now! My master's barrier is what was making us feel dizzy.

222051020.content: Ever since I was little, my master has said that Ruomu Palace is a citadel, with the mountain as its rampart and the palace as its heart—all to suppress a huge and incredibly powerful Yaoguai!

222051022.content: Right! No wicked deed is beneath that Yaoguai, and it wreaks havoc across the land! It's said to have 100 heads, 200 feet, and gigantic eyes that can't see a thing.

222051023.content: Sounds a little farfetched... What about that "Ruomu Tableau" you just mentioned?

222051024.content: "Ruomu Tableau" is the name of the space sealed off by the barrier!

222051025.content: I heard my master say that Ms. Gengchen came up with this name for her! Master used Astral Arcanum to paint a landscape, and then crammed that big Yaoguai into it like it was nothing!

222051026.content: Wait a minute... You mean the chief knows your master?

222051027.content: That's right! I think they met a long, long time ago. When I was little, Ms. Gengchen even made some spicy duck blood for me to try!

222051028.content: Also, that painting had a pavilion in the sky in it. After that, my master built a palace based on its likeness—Ruomu Palace, to be exact!

222051029.content: If we get the chance, I'll take you to see it... Well, if my master allows it.

222051030.content: According to Jinwu, the Visbane is called "Chaos," but Jinwu's description was so exaggerated that Yingzhao didn't take it seriously. She carefully examines the pile of rubble and can faintly perceive the vast and surging power of its creator from the weak Divine Power within the stones.

222051031.content: Such incredible Divine Power... Your master really is full of surprises.

222051032.content: Naturally! My master is the founder of Astral Arcanum!

222051033.content: I think I understand now—the tablets are the barrier. If we continue on from here, we'll reach Ruomu Tableau!

222051034.content: My master placed them here to stop ordinary people from wandering in and getting hurt by the Yaoguai!

222051035.content: The barrier was built with Astral Arcanum and wraps around a huge area. Anyone who approaches it will feel dizzy and disoriented until they end up back outside the barrier none the wiser.

222051036.content: So, that dizziness we felt before was to protect us rather than hurt us?

222051039.content: That was my master's doing, I guess! Hehe. She once told me, "Anything poisonous will have an antidote within ten paces of it."

222051040.content: She must have known that I'd find Ruomu Tableau and vanquish the big Yaoguai one day, so she left me a means of combatting the barrier's effects.

222051041.content: Only you would feel dizzy, think you're just hungry, and go scrounging around for something to eat...

222051042.content: Hehe, no one knows me like my master does!

222051043.content: But this tablet has been destroyed... Is the barrier ineffective now?

222051044.content: Not at all. My master is too wise to only place one. There are so many, they're like an unending city wall—even if one falls, the barrier will still hold strong. There's no way that Yaoguai is getting out!

222051045.content: Jinwu confidently strides on, but not even a few steps later, the sound of heavy footfalls comes from the narrow mountain crevice before them.

222051046.content: A hulking silhouette emerges from the fog. The powerful Visbane aura instantly makes Yingzhao tense up.

222051047.content: Eep! Wh-Wh-Wh... What is this fiend?!

222051049.content: I don't think so... The big Yaoguai is "formless," so it should be invisible.

222051050.content: Yingzhao, this Yaoguai is too formidable. Let's fall back for now and let Master's barrier stop it.

222051051.content: Yingzhao and Jinwu make a stealthy retreat to a safe distance, all the while watching as the invisible, four-armed Visbane continues after them. They make it past the pile of stones without incident.

222051052.content: Oh no! Has the barrier stele really stopped working?

222051054.content: Hey! D-D-Demon! You dare to growl in my presence?!

222051055.content: I've never seen a Visbane like this before. Jinwu, let's figure out a way to gauge its strength first.

222051056.content: Tenblaze, to me! In all my life, I've never met such a powerful Yaoguai. I now dub you "The Four-Armed-Winged-Evil-Sword Immortal." Let's settle this here and now!

222052001.content: Take this, puny Yaoguai! Take this, and that, and this—

222052002.content: Enough, you're wasting your Divine Power!

222052003.content:
In an opening between the exchange of blows, Yingzhao leaps into the air, grabs hold of Jinwu, and yanks her to the side.
A second later, two light blades of condensed Bane Energy descend from above, piercing through the spot where Jinwu was just hovering in the air and brutally boring into the ground.

222052005.content: Seeing this, Yingzhao—still holding onto Jinwu—runs for the entrance to the mine without looking back.

222052006.content: Something's not right. If Chaos really is lending that thing its Bane Energy, our attacks won't even leave a scratch on it.

222052007.content: We'll retreat for now and see if we can get help... What about your master? Where is she?

222052010.content: Still dragging Jinwu behind her, Yingzhao halts abruptly. Not far behind them, the Visbane seems to have crashed into a barrier or wall of some sort near the barrier tablet, and is unable to pursue them further.

222052011.content: Didn't your master send you down the mountain? How can you not know where she is?

222052012.content: I just don't! I was training and patrolling the mountain as usual a few days ago when... Master just disappeared!

222052013.content: So, you sneaked off the mountain?

222052014.content: Well... Master won't let me off the mountain while I'm still an apprentice.

222052016.content: After a prolonged silence, Yingzhao rubs her brow wearily, then crouches down.

222052017.content: Meanwhile, the Visbane—seeming to understand after a few failed attempts that it wouldn't be able to leave the mountain crevice—turns around and once again disappears into the mountain fog.

222052018.content: The Yaoguai went back in! Looks like Master's barrier still works!

222052019.content: All it's doing is keeping that Visbane trapped in there...

222052020.content: It would be one thing if this were just some desolate, uninhabited mountain, but with Mount Xiaoyang being turned into a mining area, all eyes are now on this place.

222052021.content: If they can't take care of the Visbane before San Ding sends its people to prospect, they'll need to take special measures to intervene in human affairs—an unacceptable outcome as far as Modifiers are concerned.

222052022.content: But Yingzhao and Jinwu's powers alone won't be enough to destroy this Visbane, and there isn't enough time to call in outside help. If only there was someone nearby that they could turn to...

222052023.content: ...Jinwu, you said that your master lives in Ruomu Palace?

222052026.content: But she's not in Ruomu Palace anymore.

222052027.content: We should still try looking for her. She may have even returned by now... Have you been back to Ruomu Palace in the past few days?

222052028.content: N-No... If Master finds out that I descended the mountain without telling her, she'll punish me for sure...

222052029.content: You'll have to go back sooner or later, won't you? Won't the punishment be harsher the longer you wait?

222052031.content: Having tried and failed to destroy the Visbane on their own, Yingzhao and Jinwu make for Mount Dayang.

222061001.content: A green field stretches out as far as the eye can see. The grass rustles softly as the wind and mist sweep over it. A pond in the near distance glistens in the hazy sunlight, giving the place an ethereal atmosphere.

222061002.content: This is the large grotto near Ruomu Palace. According to Jinwu, this is where Xihe often brings her to train.

222061003.content: At this moment, Yingzhao is sitting at the edge of the field, bringing her subordinate on the other end of the terminal up to speed on the next mission.

222061004.content: Things are going pretty smoothly. The stones have been cut and all that's left are the finishing touches—although this stage is the most time-consuming.

222061005.content: One of the samples hasn't been delivered yet, though. I think they said there's an illness in the family, so they'll be delayed.

222061006.content: I see. No worries, there's still plenty of time.

222061007.content: Are you not coming back today either, Ying?

222061008.content: I've got a tricky situation here that I'm still working out. I'll be counting on you to take care of the rest.

222061009.content: Got it, no problem. Once all the workshops have finished their work, we'll talk about the orders.

222061010.content: Don't let your guard down. San Ding is ruthless. They may try to throw a wrench in the works. Keep an eye on their movements.

222061011.content: Don't worry. We haven't gone public with this deal. No one else knows about it.

222061012.content: Then I hope everything goes without a hitch... If the industrial park construction gets off the ground, at least it will keep San Ding from having a monopoly.

222061013.content: After ending the call, Yingzhao looks over at Jinwu training in the field and sighs. They've wandered and waited around Mount Dayang for a while now, but there's still been no sign of Xihe.

222061014.content: Does your master often leave for weeks at a time like this?

222061015.content: Hmm... Not that I can remember.

222061016.content: She doesn't let me leave the mountain, but she rarely leaves either. Even if she does descend the mountain to visit someone, she usually returns the same day.

222061017.content: This won't work then. I'll just have to ask the Quad and CORG for help...

222061019.content: No, CORG is a... Never mind.

222061021.content: Huh? We're not going to wait for Master?

222061022.content: There's no time. Humans may be coming to the mountain soon, and if they run into that Visbane, it'll spell trouble.

222061023.content: Hm... You're protecting the common people as a champion of justice? Then we can't not go.

222061024.content: If we vanquish the Visbane and protect everyone, I'll definitely be praised as a hero, and then Master will have to forgive me for sneaking off the mountain...

222061025.content: They hurry down the mountain, chatting idly.

222061026.content: You're always talking about being a hero. Why do you want to be one?

222061027.content: Because heroes protect the powerless and restrain the powerful, and they stand up for what's right. Plus, everyone likes heroes!

222061029.content: That's what it says in the martial arts stories Master gave me to read. You know, like "Twin Heros in Jianghu," "Legend of the Northern Desert Hero," and, my favorite, "Prime Codex."

222061030.content: I just know I'm the "chosen one" those books talk about. And my mission is to defeat Yaoguai and rid the world of evil!

222061031.content: Ooh, ooh, also, in "Prime Codex" it says that the chosen one will meet a companion, and just like in the legends, the two heroes will travel the world and protect everyone in it!

222061032.content: Protect everyone in the world, huh...

222061033.content: Yingzhao sighs when she hears this. Though not intending to take this wide-eyed girl's words seriously, when she thinks of all her experiences in the business world, deep down, she instinctively shrinks from such lofty notions.

222061034.content: You don't want to be a hero, Yingzhao?

222061035.content: It's not as easy as that... I can't even stop San Ding Group from staking its claim on Nanjiao Isle and coercing the elderly into giving up their life's work.

222061036.content: More than 30 years after the Cloudsong Crisis, people are starting to fight amongst themselves again. Amid all these disasters, natural or otherwise, so many have been pushed to the edge of their means.

222061037.content: Commerce is supposed to be about mutual exchange and letting everyone share in the profit, but now it's become an opportunist's battleground, where the winner takes all and the loser is left destitute...

222061038.content: What do these opportunists do? Are they heartless thieves?

222061039.content: Not as bad as that... It's just that greed and selfishness will always be in people's hearts. Even if you want to be a hero who helps everyone, it just doesn't work out that way at the end of the day.

222061042.content: Spotting a large rock by the side of the road, Jinwu leaps onto it and points Tenblaze at the sun.

222061043.content: Even in the comics I've read, heroes can't save everyone. There are things they can't do, and they're misunderstood by people or even made out to be villains...

222061044.content: But that's fine. Heroes still have to act when people need their help. Even if they're defeated, as long as they've walked the path of righteousness, everyone will like them in the end.

222061045.content: "Be a champion of justice in heart and deed. A great hero is swayed neither by victory nor failure"—That's my favorite line. Anyone who can change people for the better is a hero!

222061047.content: So, I will have to work even harder. I will defeat the Yaoguai beyond the barrier!

222061048.content: From this day forward, I will be renowned far and wide, and my tale too will be made into a comic one day! Hm... Let's see... It could be called "Jinwu: The Wandering Warrior!" Hehe...

222061049.content: Seeing Jinwu suddenly leap into one of her peculiar monologues, Yingzhao shakes her head helplessly with the hint of a smile on her face.

222061050.content: She may seem like a certifiable dummy, but Jinwu's optimism and passion are genuinely comforting. Infectious, even.

222061051.content: ...Why don't we focus on our strategy for now?

222061052.content: A short time later, Yingzhao and Jinwu reach Yang Valley. Even now, there's still mist everywhere.

222061053.content: Chewing on hibiscus flowers, they investigate with their Access Keys at hand. Now accustomed to the petals' bitterness, they can even taste a refreshing flavor that raises their spirits and clears their heads.

222061054.content: They're quite a ways from the old mine, but they can make out a figure in the fog. Startled, Yingzhao is about to pull Jinwu to one side when she discovers that Jinwu is already charging over with her sword raised.

222061055.content: You brazen Yaoguai, eat this... Huh?

222061058.content: Fancy meeting you here, of all places.

222061059.content: And you must be Xihe's disciple, the famous "Sun Chaser."

222061060.content: How did you know that? Hehe, I mean, that's me all right!

222061061.content: Jinwu immediately relaxes upon hearing Mengzhang's flattery, beating her chest proudly as if she weren't just rushing at him with a sword a moment earlier.

222061062.content: There's a rumor going around these parts that a little girl calling herself a hero offered her services to a bakery. But she ended up putting a powder flame retardant from the backyard into the machine instead of flour.

222061064.content: That broke the machine. The hero was so ashamed that she left compensation for the damages and ran off.

222061066.content: Jinwu's face is bright red as she waves her hands in a panic to stop Mengzhang.

222061067.content: What happened? I haven't heard about this.

222061068.content: Hehe, it happened a week ago. Would you like to guess how much our hero left as compensation?

222061069.content: ...Five coins! Hahaha... In ancient Xu Heng currency no less. They went out of circulation two centuries ago.

222061070.content: Y-You... How was I supposed to know that my money wouldn't be any good?! Master usually takes some coins with her when she goes down the mountain!

222061071.content: No more talking about this! No more, no more, no more—

222061072.content: Jinwu shakes her head vigorously, then sits down by the side of the road in a pout. Mengzhang grins devilishly.

222061073.content: You know Xihe, Deputy Mengzhang? We've been looking for her.

222061075.content: As luck would have it, I saw her two days ago. As luck would not have it, she's gone into seclusion.

222061077.content: As sure as the day is long. I believe you two are familiar with the mountain barrier?

222061078.content: The geology of the floating islands has been unstable these last few years. That thing being suppressed below is restless and can't be left unchecked.

222061079.content: Oh! So, Master went to suppress the big Yaoguai.

222061080.content: The big Yaoguai? Do you mean Chaos? Hm... "Yaoguai" is indeed a fitting name for the calamity within this mountain.

222061081.content: Astral Arcanum is a mystery to me, but I do know a thing or two about uncovering the truth. Bane Energy is building up in Yang Valley like magma in a volcano. Just one fracture, and I fear the whole thing will blow.

222061082.content: From what Xihe has said, "Chaos" comes and goes without a trace and changes form so readily that its true nature is uncertain. Who knows what it takes to suppress it?

222061083.content: You just came from inside there. You didn't see the Visbane?

222061084.content: Xihe was adamant that I stay away from the painted realm. I would never disrespect her wishes... Besides, the barrier is still intact and Chaos can't come out. What Visbane?

222061085.content: Yingzhao and Jinwu look at each other, speechless. Seeing the surprise in Mengzhang's expression, they quickly summarize their encounter with the Visbane in the old mine. Mengzhang frowns.

222061086.content: For barrier arrays to work, they must remain completely intact. Even a pebble breaking off the tablet is a serious matter.

222061087.content: The Visbanes you've encountered were likely... uh, formed? Summoned? By the Bane Energy... The origins of the Visbane are, after all, still unknown.

222061088.content: Yingzhao, Jinwu and I will take care of the Yang Valley Visbanes. You should be getting back.

222061090.content: Before coming to the mountain this afternoon, I heard some rather unfavorable news regarding Tian Lu Traders. If you were there to handle the situation, it would be okay, but you're all the way out here. And by the looks of it, this is the first you're hearing of it...

222061091.content: Is San Ding up to something again?

222061092.content: As if verifying what Mengzhang has said, Yingzhao's terminal receives a communication. When she sees her subordinate's name, she has a bad feeling about what's to come...

222071001.content: An hour later, on the Nanjiao Isle Plaza footpath.

222071002.content: A provisional open-air venue with banners hoisted up all around it is surrounded by a tightly packed crowd of onlookers.

222071003.content: Yingzhao walks toward the venue with a grim expression on her face. Some people, recognizing her, whisper to each other as they make way.

222071004.content: What goes around comes around! Remember that!

222071005.content: Stealing our order is one thing, but to rub it in our faces with all this pomp and ceremony...

222071006.content: I'm talking about you, Shoumo! You were quieter than a mouse after the bid—turns out you were just biding your *Xu Heng Slang* time!

222071008.content: Stop, stop, stop, Director Yingzhao is here.

222071010.content: Yingzhao walks over to the indignant workshop owners, quickly scanning through the communication records between them and Tian Lu Traders over the last two days.

222071011.content: Representative Yingzhao... (Sighs) Some rat among us sold out to San Ding!

222071012.content: According to our downstream partner in Yu Jing, a workshop owner spilled the beans to San Ding about our order. San Ding dipped into their Songjade reserves to rush a batch out, then sold it to the buyer at 50% off.

222071013.content: As for us, everyone scraped what they had and generously pitched in to fulfill this order. We didn't even have the time to sign a contract. San Ding took advantage of that and had that person scrap the order in our name.

222071014.content: And with San Ding once again using the news of the mining operation to drive the price of Songjade down, no jewelers are willing to take the goods off our hands at their original price and quantity... They pulled the rug out from under us.

222071015.content: That's our order up in smoke, and the only ore we had left wasted! That *Xu Heng Slang* Shoumo, he's as bad as they come!

222071016.content: Hehe, my dear friends and professionals. I could hear you singing my praises from the street corner.

222071017.content: As if waiting for Yingzhao to make an appearance, Shoumo nonchalantly enters the venue with his retinue. He walks straight past the crowd.

222071018.content: *Xu Heng Slang* praises! Just say you couldn't care less what happens to us, you two-faced *Xu Heng Slang*! You make me sick!

222071019.content: Tch, Songjade won't be worth much pretty soon. Just look at the price you gave your "friends" in the jewelry business. Swindling market outsiders like that... Tsk, tsk, tsk.

222071020.content: When the price of Songjade drops and the value of their goods depreciates, it'll be a blemish on the face of Xu Heng.

222071021.content: You are just a *Xu Heng Slang* lier.

222071022.content: Oh my, are we getting emotional? But just look at how calm Representative Yingzhao is.

222071023.content: Shoumo takes the microphone handed over by his subordinate and resumes going about his own business, giving the workshop owners and Yingzhao the cold shoulder.

222071024.content: San Ding's business approach can be summed up like this: The market is like a battlefield—show no mercy, be the best at what you do, and accept nothing less than victory.

222071025.content: We're holding this pre-development ceremony to announce to you all that San Ding is greatly committed to this project.

222071026.content: We're bringing in a 500-person engineering team from Yu Jing to get an early start on construction. Building a factory here will serve as our modest contribution to Nanjiao Isle's economy.

222071027.content: But San Ding is just here to excavate ore—that's the extent of our reach. The future construction of an industrial park will require much in the way of supporting infrastructure, service-based businesses...

222071028.content: No one can help but admit that Shoumo has a way with words. As far as lay people are concerned, there's nothing in his speech to arouse suspicion.

222071029.content: What do we do now, boss?

222071030.content: Let's get everyone together and see if we can figure out a long-term strategy. If San Ding really is planning to build an industrial park, they'll stop at nothing to do it.

222071031.content: Okay, I'll get everyone... Wait a minute, where did they go?

222071032.content: The angry workshop owners from just before are now nowhere to be seen.

222071033.content: Yingzhao and her assistant hurriedly split up to look for them. A few minutes later, a message from her subordinate makes Yingzhao's eyes fling open in shock.

222071034.content: Boss, they went to the mountain. They say they're going to enter the mine and dig up at least enough Songjade to cover their losses...

222071036.content: After a frantic pursuit, Yingzhao finally catches up with the enraged workshop owners at the edge of the mining area.

222071037.content: Don't go any further, it's dangerous in there!

222071038.content: Hahaha, quit pulling our legs, Representative Yingzhao. We have nothing left, who cares if it's dangerous?

222071039.content: If you're really concerned about us, then let us through. With a little Songjade, we can keep going for a few more days.

222071040.content: There's no need to be reckless. We can continue with our plan, and Tian Lu Traders can...

222071041.content: Can do what?! We've kept our noses to the grindstone all our lives, only to be screwed over in the end for trying to earn an honest living.

222071042.content: If we've learned one thing from all of this, it's that the big corporations will only ever use us as pawns in their money-making gambits. Where's your integrity? You don't care if plebs like us live or die!

222071044.content: The crowd erupts in a fervor that renders Yingzhao speechless. Like a stone in a riverbed, all she can do is watch as the crowd flows around her and into the perilous mists.

222071045.content: Yingzhao's heart trembles like it's taken a blow from a hammer. She never expected such harsh rebuke from the very people she wanted to help.

222071046.content: Why... Why would they think that?

222071047.content: Have they always felt this way? Is this how people see Tian Lu Traders...?

222071048.content: Yingzhao looks back somewhat blankly. All she sees is the narrow mountain path to the mine and thick fog like the gaping maw of a monster, swallowing up one person after another.

222071050.content: The workshop owners aren't the only ones acting strangely. Wasn't Yingzhao, left frozen in place just because of a few words, not her usual self either?

222071051.content: It's that Visbane, "Chaos!" Chaos can influence people's minds...

222071052.content: Mustering up Divine Power to protect her psyche, Yingzhao walks forward only half a step when the entire mine suddenly looks as if it's been transformed by some mysterious power into a flat watercolor painting.

222071053.content: In this exceedingly strange scene, inky, greenish clouds swirl through the field. In its center only a short distance in front of Yingzhao, a figure slowly rises.

222071054.content: Yingzhao's expression shifts, and with gradually burgeoning determination, she grips hold of her weapon.

222071055.content: Did you never think about why things would turn out this way? I'll tell you: It's because you never dared to imagine how malicious San Ding could be, or how inept your subordinates could be.

222071056.content: Those workshop owners were shoved into the abyss by your own hand! And yet now you want to save them.

222071057.content: "Save"—What gives you the right to utter this word? Allow me to illustrate to you just how weak you really are.

222072001.content: Hehe... I thought you'd learned something. Turns out you've just sunk deeper into your own dream.

222072002.content: Really? I think I've just woken up.

222072003.content: I am you, I say exactly what's in your heart. What are you running from?

222072004.content: You're Chaos, trapped within a barrier. All you can do is use others' negative emotions to mess with people's heads.

222072005.content: At the end of the day, you "special ability" can't do any harm at all. If I want to shut you up, I just need to have a clear head.

222072006.content: Linyu, the boss, Mengzhang, Jinwu, the workshop owners, that old woman... There are always people telling me what the right thing to do is, yet I still hesitate even now.

222072007.content: When this is all over, I should do some serious self-reflection.

222072008.content: Her mind starts to clear. It seems like the final crack is sealing, shutting out all external influences. Yingzhao watches as the figure gradually dissipates, then she lets out a long sigh.

222072009.content: Exhausted, Yingzhao drags the last of the unconscious workshop owners out of Yang Valley. She notices two familiar figures approaching on the mountain path.

222072011.content: Where were you? We looked all night for you.

222072012.content: All night? I wasn't in Yang Valley that long...

222072013.content: She glances behind her. The area is rather small. If it weren't for the dense mountain fog, she could see all of it from here.

222072014.content: Yingzhao tells them about what she experienced. She thought she'd only been gone a few minutes, but in fact it'd been nearly two days. All three are amazed.

222072015.content: Sorry that you spent all that time searching for me...

222072016.content: That's what friends are for! But that barrier really is strange.

222072017.content: Can Master's technique affect time? Or can that big Yaoguai make people's dreams seem like dreams......

222072018.content: "Make people's dreams seem like dreams?" What does that mean?

222072019.content: You know, they go by like "Whoosh!"

222072021.content: Everyone's been brought back out now, but there's something I still don't understand.

222072022.content: Why did Xihe's method of keeping people from passing through the barrier stop working?

222072023.content: When they first entered the mountain, Yingzhao and Jinwu felt dizzy and muddleheaded. The workshop owners, on the other hand, seemed completely unaffected.

222072024.content: Could the effects of Master's barrier have weakened from all the damage?

222072025.content: If that's the case, the Yang Mountains should be cordoned off. I'll search again for Xihe when I can, but if I still can't find her, I'll return to the Quad and ask the chief to come.

222072026.content: Help me bring these people to Vermilion Wellness first. They may look fine, but I'm concerned that their encounter with Chaos may have affected them in ways we can't see.

222072027.content: Also, I'm going back to visit the old artisan. I have another idea for this Songjade dispute...

222072028.content: So much to do... I'll go get something to eat first. I'm tired and hungry after running around the mountain all night.

222072029.content: Noon that day at the old artisan's workshop.

222072030.content: Hehe, so that's what happened. Good thing I'm over the hill already, or I would have gone up the mountain with them.

222072031.content: The old artisan chuckles as he comes down from his workbench. He presents a few objects to his visitors that immediately grab their attention.

222072032.content: Oh my, I've never seen anything like them.

222072033.content: Hehehe, you could say these are our proudest works—all hand-carved. Machine tools were only used for cutting and processing.

222072034.content: He picks up a Songjade pendant half the size of his palm and places it in Yingzhao's hand.

222072035.content: It's exquisite—more like a work of art than an accessory—with six dragons twirling over a stormy sea. Exquisite craftsmanship and elegant patterns. If you give it a gentle shake, you can hear a curious sound emitted from it like a dragon singing.

222072036.content: Thank you for believing in me enough to entrust something so precious to me.

222072037.content: Hahaha, we didn't give it as much thought as that. Anyway, who didn't dream of being an artist when they were young?

222072038.content: I'll ask my kid if he'd like to learn the craft from his old man. It's nothing special, but I'd hate to see it die out.

222072039.content: At my age, I don't have many years left to train an apprentice...

222072040.content: Hey! Don't say that, that's bad luck!

222072042.content: To be honest, I've seen a number of Luliang's jade collectibles, but none like this "Six Dragons Subduing the Sea."

222072043.content: Yingzhao, why don't you sell it to me? I'm really taken with it.

222072044.content: I actually plan to exhibit it in Omorfies... Why don't you discuss it with the artist himself when I bring it back?

222072045.content: You think you can take something so precious to Omorfies just to advertise? Do you have any idea what they're like in Omorfies?

222072046.content: If it goes to Omorfies, I'm afraid you'll only return with cash in its place.

222072047.content: Mengzhang, where's Omorfies? Is it far away?

222072048.content: Depends. If you travel through the Source... uh, "underneath," I suppose it's less than an hour away?

222072049.content: Wow, sounds really convenient. I want to go there too sometime. What's it like? Do they have anything good to eat?

222072050.content: It's a temple to art. You can admire all sorts of artworks there. Music, installation art, dance...

222072053.content: Tch, that's no fun. I'll have to bring my big pot and seasonings then. I'll have a hard time there if the food isn't good.

222072054.content: You should be asking me about the food there. They have some strange dishes, like baked snails, pig liver pate, seaweed pudding...

222072055.content: Ignoring their conversation, Yingzhao wraps up the painstakingly-crafted object and leaves it in the care of her subordinate.

222072056.content: There will always be something that a big, automated factory can't produce, and there will always be ideas that even chicanery by companies like San Ding can't crush.

222072057.content: Shoumo's push for assembly lines and scaling up isn't the only way forward. Commerce will only be more varied and differentiated in the future.

222072058.content: In an ideal world, everyone's life needs will be met, their creative passions will be embraced, and they'll be driven to compete...

222072059.content: Let's show San Ding who the real stick in the mud is.

222072060.content: After bidding farewell to the old artisan, the three receive word that the factory owners have regained consciousness. They are planning to go to Vermilion Wellness to pay them a visit and to discuss the new plan.

222072061.content: Deputy Mengzhang, Jinwu, did you find that Visbane after we parted ways yesterday?

222072062.content: We did, and it was just as you said—the constant flow of Bane Energy made slaying it no easy feat. What was that Yaoguai's name again, Hero Jinwu?

222072063.content: "The Four-Armed-Winged-Evil-Sword Immortal!" Really, Mengzhang, how careless of you to forget our adversary's name like that!

222072064.content: Haha... Anyway, it was indeed quite strange. Also, it wasn't just that "Evil-Sword Immortal"—there was another Visbane that looked to be of the same ilk.

222072066.content: Hero Jinwu, what should that one be titled?

222072067.content: Oh, right, a title. Let's see... I henceforth dub that other Yaoguai "The Wicked-Winged-Deer-Headed-Evil-Blade Immortal!"

222072068.content: A blade and sword immortal make for a fine pairing.

222072070.content: Nope. Looks like only you had the displeasure.

222072071.content: But we did find an intact tablet. It would seem the damage to the barrier isn't so bad. We can still count on Xihe's technique to work.

222072072.content: I hope so... It's already been two days since the bid ended, and San Ding held some sort of mobilization event. They could start sending people into the mountain any day now.

222072073.content: Deputy Mengzhang, would you be able to go back to Yang Valley with us to get some help? Even if we can't sort out the barrier, we should at least destroy the Visbanes.

222072074.content: Yes, yes, yes! I thought you'd never ask. My body is full of primeval power right now, just itching to bring those Yaoguai to justice!

222072075.content: I can help, of course, but... are we about to get more bad news?

222072076.content: Mengzhang suddenly looks to the end of the street. Yingzhao follows his gaze and sees someone in a Tian Lu Traders uniform making their way through the crowd—It's Yingzhao's assistant.

222072077.content: Boss! It looks like San Ding heard about the workshop owners going into the mountain for Songjade. They've set off with an engineering team!

222072078.content: I think they're going to fence off the area and start excavating early without even waiting for the review results!

222081001.content: Tian Lu Traders—I must warn you, we consider this malicious intent to impede our construction works!

222081002.content: Your actions are causing us continued harm. If you do not leave at once, I will report you to the authorities and demand compensation!

222081003.content: The roaring of machinery echoes between the two modestly-sized mountains. Yingzhao and others are standing in the narrow mountain path.

222081004.content: With the mine just behind them, it's a somewhat odd scene to behold.

222081005.content: We do have discovered some anomalies in the mine and have already notified the relevant department at CORG. We ask that you wait for them.

222081006.content: CORG? Why? This is a business dispute—You could roll out the red carpet for CORG's president, but he still has no right to interfere!

222081007.content: Representative Yingzhao, I hope you understand what you're doing right now. Our engineering machinery is equipped with recording devices. We'll have a full record of everything you say and do!

222081008.content: If you don't get out of the way this instant, we'll tally up the damages incurred in the time you've delayed us and send the bill to Tian Lu Traders. Then we'll see you in court!

222081009.content: I understand perfectly well. As I said before, CORG will be arriving any minute now. I ask that you wait patiently until they do.

222081010.content: Yingzhao knows full well that the odds are not in her favor. But behind her is an area of Visbane activity. As a Modifier, her present actions have nothing to do with the bid—they're about the Visbane threat itself.

222081011.content: Although she notified CORG on her way over, considering that the Quake Damage Control Department's main forces are currently deployed in Yu Jing, it will take them at least an hour to arrive.

222081012.content: (Will I really be able to hold them off until then...?)

222081013.content: Director Shoumo, the Equipment Department wants to confirm the equipment return date. But with these guys blocking the road... Are we really going to wait for CORG?

222081014.content: ...I'm not that patient. The higher-ups gave us a tight budget and a tighter schedule.

222081015.content: Go tell security to put on their riot gear and push these people aside. They must not be allowed to delay our schedule any longer!

222081016.content: After his subordinate hurries off, Shoumo once again approaches Yingzhao, his finger almost poking into her forehead.

222081017.content: Representative Yingzhao, this is your last warning: Take your people and go.

222081018.content: San Ding has done everything by the book, whereas you've done nothing but try and thwart our work.

222081019.content: I've already called in security. If you won't cooperate, I'll be forced to consider more coercive measures!

222081020.content: Hey, if you know what's good for you, you'll listen to what we're saying! There really are Yao... I mean, dangers in there. We can't let you go in!

222081021.content: I say, Representative Yingzhao—Is Tian Lu Traders so understaffed that you've resorted to child labor?

222081022.content: Excuse you, I'm legally an adult!

222081023.content: It's no use trying to provoke me. I'm simply stating the facts. If CORG confirms that there is no danger in the mine, Tian Lu Traders will reimburse you for the wasted time.

222081024.content: I don't want your reimbursement, I want you all to get out of our way—Now.

222081025.content: ...The qualification review is still in progress. Technically, San Ding Group is not authorized to begin construction yet.

222081026.content: That has nothing to do with you, mind your own business! Just accept that Tian Lu Traders was utterly defeated!

222081027.content: Shoumo's rage is plain on his face, and he's clearly lost his patience. Yingzhao has a bad feeling about this.

222081028.content: Already having a pretty good read on this guy, she knows that if she tries to stop him by force, he'll do something to force his way through—with or without Chaos' influence.

222081029.content: Mengzhang went ahead to take care of the Visbanes... I should have kept him with us.

222081030.content: Yingzhao, they look awfully mad. I think they might try to force their way past us...

222081031.content: Where's security? I need crowd control!

222081032.content: Hey! That's no way to thank someone who's only trying to help you!

222081033.content: Heh, where are my manners? See them off!

222081034.content: Ha, with those shabby iron rods? I'd like to see you try... Huh?!

222081035.content: By the time the dense barrage of rubber bullets is fired, Yingzhao has already yanked Jinwu out of the way. Together, they roll behind a tree next to the road.

222081036.content: Whoa, they weren't bluffing! Now I'm really mad!

222081037.content: What are you gawking at?! Get moving, now! Don't forget why you're here!

222081038.content: Rumbling engines propel massive machines into the mining field. The mountainsides around the mine begin to collapse under the force of various hammers, drills, and chisels.

222081039.content: San Ding Group intends to widen the mining site by excavating the mountainsides, expanding the original above-ground platform so that ore can be packed up and shipped directly from the mine.

222081040.content: This is bad... Jinwu, can Xihe's barrier hold up against machines like these?

222081041.content: The barrier is to stop Yaoguai, not people! Yaoguai may be powerless against it, but to humans, it's just an ordinary stone tablet!

222081043.content: They'll be fine if we keep them to the mine, but if they end up in the Ruomu Tableau... they'll find there's no negotiating with Visbanes.

222081044.content: Yingzhao then runs to the mining site with Jinwu in tow, but it's already too late. The mountain crevice where the barrier was set has completely collapsed amid mechanical growls—and so has the barrier stele.

222081045.content: An intense surge of Bane Energy sweeps through the dust, like an incoming tidal wave.

222081046.content: I'm sensing a lot of Yaoguai!

222081048.content: As if with the flip of a switch, a familiar force vibrates outward from the distance.

222081049.content: In the blink of an eye, the entire mining site has been enveloped in the inky Ruomu Tableau.

222081050.content: The barrier isn't working, the Ruomu Tableau is expanding...

222081051.content: At this moment, Ruomu Tableau is like a gigantic bubble flooded with twisting, chaotic Bane Energy that seems like it could burst at any moment.

222081052.content: In the middle of the open field, Mengzhang is trading blows with two powerful Visbanes.

222081053.content: Well, well, well. You've really dug yourself into a hole this time, haven't you?

222081054.content: What's going on here? What is this place? Is... this some sort of virtual reality film?!

222081055.content: The crowd caught in Ruomu Tableau stand near the battlefield, staring around dumbstruck, still oblivious to the crisis they've set off.

222081057.content: Yingzhao rushes in with Jinwu, her voice commanding authority. Finally realizing the trouble they're in, they cry out in terror and scatter in all directions.

222081058.content: Do you have any idea what you've done? I tried to stop you from coming in, but nooo!

222081059.content: Grabbing Shoumo by the collar, Jinwu furiously shakes him with her right fist at the ready, but does not strike him.

222081060.content: Maybe now you'll learn to listen to people! Hmph!

222081061.content: What a mess... Jinwu, Yingzhao, could you two take over for me for a bit over here?

222081062.content: Fortunately for everyone here, I've already got a plan... You hold off the Visbanes, and—as much as it pains me—I'll get these people out of here.

222081063.content: With a snap of his fingers, Mengzhang's Access Key rises up in a flash of streaming green light and quickly expands to the size of a moving dolly, while Mengzhang appears next to someone in the distance with even greater speed.

222081064.content: What are you trying to do?!

222081066.content: After expertly stunning everyone from San Ding Group, Mengzhang tosses them onto his Access Key. Sword in hand, he then charges for the edge of the painted realm and gets everyone out in one go. Yingzhao's jaw drops.

222081067.content: Hey, Yingzhao! Come fight this Yaoguai with me!

222081069.content: Astonished by Mengzhang's foresight, Yingzhao finally snaps out of it and rushes to the battlefield.

222082001.content: Hehe, let's get this over with then... Whoa!

222082002.content: The Tableau is collapsing! You two, with me!

222082003.content: A cracking sound like a giant tree branch snapping rings out from the sky, and the tremors beneath their feet grow increasingly violent.

222082004.content: Not taking any chances, all three dash out from the Ruomu Tableau to the mountain path at the outskirts of the mining field. The painted realm has now spread out over a vast area.

222082005.content: All of a sudden, Yingzhao stops.

222082006.content: Wait a minute, if Ruomu Tableau collapses... what happens to Chaos?

222082008.content: If the barrier collapses, then the big Yaoguai will definitely get free.

222082010.content: Yingzhao then turns around and steps back into the painted realm.

222082013.content: Before Mengzhang and Jinwu can react, the painted realm suddenly contracts, disappearing right before their very eyes.

222082015.content: Trembling violently, Yingzhao pours all the Divine Power in her body into the ground with her Access Key in an attempt to stabilize her surroundings.

222082016.content: But unlike an ordinary space, the painted realm is part of the barrier and it's far more complex than Yingzhao knows. Her Divine Power backfires and almost hurts her.

222082017.content: (Coughing) I guess... I should have expected no less from Xihe's handiwork. This power is immense, how can I...

222082018.content: She stubbornly bores her weapon into the ground again.

222082019.content: A painted realm... a painting. I understand now, so that was you all along...

222082020.content: If only I'd been mature enough to understand what you meant. Looks like it's too late now.

222082021.content: Not one to make the same mistake twice, her Divine Power doesn't backfire this time. Instead, the painted realm draws it from her body at an unimaginable speed. However, this only just slows its collapse slightly.

222082022.content: This massive drain she's never experienced makes her head spin. The mountains and rivers before her gradually blur, and all she can feel is the increasing intensity of the tremors.

222082023.content: Is this... as far as I go...?

222082024.content: Her consciousness slips away from her body and plummets downwards as if wrapped in a heavy layer of fog.

222082025.content: When she reaches the bottom of the abyss, an endless space of nothingness and silence stretches out around her.

222082026.content: That familiar, yet strange voice sounds in her ear.

222082027.content: You go on and on about "protecting," but what have you protected in the end?

222082028.content: Everything in this world works according to a set of established rules. The more you struggle and resist, the more you hasten your own demise.

222082029.content: Isn't this the opposite of what you want? You've hurt the people you want to protect, and you ultimately protected your enemy.

222082030.content: When they wake up, they'll resume their plans and keep hurting the ones you want to protect.

222082031.content: And there's nothing you can do about it.

222082032.content: You're just a pathetic person that the world will forget all about.

222082034.content: After a long silence, Yingzhao's eyes open. The scene before her is nothing but a murky haze, but her expression is completely calm.

222082036.content: Even if everything you've done only makes everything worse?

222082037.content: I didn't make things worse with what I've done. It was my confusion and indecision that did that.

222082038.content: You can hold on, you can give up... But if you aren't sure of what you're doing, it will only make things worse.

222082039.content: Even now, you believe that what you think is right has any meaning?

222082041.content: I used to just believe that right is right and wrong is wrong, that Modifiers destroying Visbanes is just and the strong bullying the weak is evil.

222082042.content: But then I realized that many things in this world aren't as simple as right and wrong.

222082043.content: The new push out the old, and the old are laid off. People are forced or threatened to choose betrayal and deception, or to compromise with their adversary for the sake of their children's futures...

222082044.content: I've witnessed this so many times that now when I see someone who wants to be a hero and protect the world... I can't help but mock it in my heart.

222082047.content: There will always be things we can't change. Ridiculous rules and unfair situations will always exist.

222082048.content: I may not be able to change them, but that won't stop me from trying.

222082049.content: How can someone paint something they haven't seen before? The answer is clear to me now.

222082050.content: That landscape has always been in my heart, and I'm already on my way to reach it.

222082052.content: At some point, the phantasm disappears, and an enveloping warmth takes its place.

222082053.content: A light blooms in the endless void. A figure steps out from it, then strolls over to Yingzhao.

222082054.content: Well done, young woman. You're beginning to understand. But know this—

222082055.content: There is no need to seek that landscape. It is people themselves who create the most majestic views in this world.

222091001.content: Summery sunlight shines through the leaves and languidly dapples the stones on the mountain path.

222091002.content: Yingzhao opens her eyes. It takes her a moment to adjust to the bright light.

222091004.content: How do you feel, Yingzhao? Are you dizzy?

222091006.content: Yingzhao sits up, then stares blankly at the teenaged-looking girl in front of her. Finally, she speaks up.

222091007.content:
I think I just heard your voice a moment ago...
Are you... Xihe?

222091010.content: I have been in seclusion for a fortnight. If my power couldn't restore the painted realm now, I wouldn't be fit to be the master of Ruomu Palace.

222091011.content: Speaking of which, you're quite the impulsive one, young lady.

222091012.content: In all these years, I have been trying to shrink the space of Ruomu Tableau. This seclusion was exactly for me to practice the Astral Arcanum and shrink the barrier.

222091013.content: When you destroyed the Visbanes in the painted realm, the tremors and falling stones weren't the result of the painted realm collapsing. I was simply employing my technique.

222091014.content: This demanded my full attention, so I did not tell any of you. But then you rushed back into the painted realm, giving me a new headache to deal with.

222091015.content: Hehe! An evil deed with good intentions!

222091016.content: ...I was just trying to stop Chaos from escaping and subjecting the people of Nanjiao Isle to a new disaster.

222091017.content: You care about the welfare of others, just like that wunderkind at Tian Lu Traders.

222091018.content: Noticing the contrast between Xihe's youthful appearance and her strangely archaic manner of speaking, Yingzhao can't help but smile.

222091019.content: Oh right! Master, what became of Chaos in the end?

222091020.content: I'm curious as well... I saw it twice in the painted realm, and it looked like me.

222091021.content: Ahaha, it was me the second time. You made a mess of my plans, so I decided to mess with... ahem, give you a chance to reflect.

222091022.content: As for your first encounter... that was indeed Chaos. It exploited my negligence.

222091023.content: Now that I have reinforced the seal, the barrier has shifted to a place beyond perception. It shouldn't give us any more trouble for the next 30 to 50 years.

222091024.content: You mean, the Yang Valley mining field is...

222091025.content: The Visbanes have been annihilated. They can dig up that Songjade ore as they please.

222091026.content: Humanity truly eludes understanding—That rock, simply put, is a variety of Cloudsong. What was a symbol of disaster in decades past is now being worshiped as a treasure...

222091027.content: Humans interact with the world in their own way I suppose... That reminds me, where's Deputy Mengzhang?

222091028.content: I've sent him packing back to Yuyi Isle. He came two days ago, then suddenly returned again. He must think Mount Dayang is a public park.

222091029.content: Yingzhao smiles when she hears Xihe take Mengzhang to task like this.

222091030.content: Alright. If there's nothing else, I'll be going back to Mount Dayang.

222091031.content: Clear days on the mountain are exceedingly rare. Now that I have some leisure time, I'm going to go get some sun at the palace.

222091033.content:
Coming, Master!
Yingzhao, I'm going back up the mountain with Master.

222091034.content: This trip down the mountain made me realize that I still have a long way to go with my training.

222091035.content: But come visit me when you have time! We can have some spicy duck blood together!

222091036.content: From the mountain path, Yingzhao's eyes follow Jinwu's sprightly figure as it recedes into the distance, bidding farewell to her new friend with a smile.

222091037.content: Exhaustion from the fighting and coordinating, however, soon renders her face expressionless once again.

222091038.content: My work isn't finished yet. And I'll need to talk again with the boss about my travel expenses this trip...

222091039.content: After the Ruomu Tableau incident, CORG's operatives finally arrived and began wiping the memories of the unharmed San Ding workers.

222091040.content: Tian Lu Traders raised an objection against San Ding Group's review on the basis of the prior "order theft" and "unauthorized construction."

222091041.content: Tian Lu Traders' objection earned the people's support—the workshop owners' in particular. Additionally, owing to another "significant enabling factor," another vote was held.

222091042.content: This "significant enabling factor" actually came from an article from Omorfies.

222091043.content: Outside the conference building, before the new vote.

222091044.content: "Time is like flowing water—everything within it exists in a constant state of flux. A craftsperson, however, can grant such things an eternal form."

222091045.content: "'Six Dragons Subduing the Sea' has its origins in the totems and ancient legends of Xu Heng. While I have not yet acquired expertise in the subject, this piece is replete with divine expression as well as a seasoned artistic sensibility.

222091046.content: "I have seen many luxury products manufactured from Songjade which bore no trace of the heart and soul of a craftsperson—just machinery, emptiness, and opportunism. I see more artistic value in a pile of bricks discarded by wall builders."

222091047.content: "I must reiterate—it is not the materials that make a work of art precious. Its true value is always determined by the spirit, ingenuity, and expression crystalized within it."

222091048.content: "There's a saying in Xu Heng: 'The ocean is vast for it welcomes all rivers.' Artists should embrace new ideas and techniques as much as they should draw from the knowledge and inspiration passed down since antiquity..."

222091049.content: Wow... Incredible. Who wrote this, boss? It's *Xu Heng Slang* beautiful!

222091050.content: ...I don't know. But for it to be published anonymously in Omorfies' most preeminent journal, it must have been quite a high-profile artist.

222091051.content: The Songjade piece astutely sent to Stellaris Academy a few days ago caused a stir all through Omorfies...

222091052.content: One the one hand, Songjade had all but vanished from the market following the halt on its ore production. On the other, the works the old artisan sent were top-quality masterpieces without exception.

222091053.content: As soon as they were exhibited in Omorfies, they elicited an exceedingly widespread, enthusiastic response from the art-loving populace.

222091054.content: Without hesitation, the Stellaris Academy Sculpture Pavilion paid a tidy sum to enter the pieces into its collection.

222091055.content: This is good. San Ding has become the old artisan's raw materials supplier, and Songjade's value is now up to the artists.

222091056.content: Hehe, and carvings are just one way to process the stones. Let's see how long San Ding can stand working for us when they see all the different works we can create with it!

222091057.content: Be careful. San Ding may take advantage of that overconfidence of yours again.

222091058.content: I know, I know, and I take full responsibility for my performance last month...

222091059.content: Oh, Yingzhao, isn't that seminar on industrial incubators about to start?

222091061.content: That unflappable expression restored to her face and the files in hand, Yingzhao walks unhurriedly, yet deliberately toward the assembly hall building.

222091062.content: The battle with the Visbanes is over, yet a battle of commerce is underway...

222101002.content: Deep in the mists of Mount Dayang, crane tracks in the woods and deer paths around the spring can be seen. Also, there are two people sitting across from each other in front of an abandoned workshop.

222101003.content: Zhu had an old friend she often told me about. Apparently, this friend likes to disguise herself as a common woman and stroll around the streets...

222101004.content: Hmph. That kid surely marches to the beat of her own drum, talking about things like that everywhere she went... or making a show of being taller by patting my head.

222101005.content: Hey, this is no laughing matter. I don't care if you're a deputy, I'll have you doing chores in Ruomu Palace for the next three years.

222101006.content: I wouldn't dare... I came to Nanjiao Isle for this workshop. Might I humbly inquire if you have any news of Zhu?

222101007.content: Did she leave you a message to come look for me?

222101008.content: In a way... I've searched through all the records Zhu left behind, and you're the only one that may have some clues.

222101010.content: After pondering for a moment, Xihe gently raises her hand and tosses a green key to Mengzhang.

222101011.content: Go take a look. Maybe you'll find what you're looking for.

222101013.content: Taking the key, Mengzhang rises and bows. He turns, but then immediately sits back down.

222101014.content: If I may be so bold... There is still much work left to be done in Xu Heng. With your talents, why sequester yourself all the way out here?

222101015.content: Gengchen never told you? I'm surprised.

222101016.content: Does it have something to do with Ruomu Palace?

222101018.content: Mengzhang can only shake his head and smile at Xihe's capriciousness.

222101019.content: You must understand that everything has its price. Be it Xu Heng or Nanjiao Isle, peace after a great disaster inevitably comes at an enormous, often unknown cost.

222101021.content: I also know that the Quad is beset with difficulties right now. If you think back, however, it's been like this for nearly 30 years.

222101022.content: Every day is beset with difficulties, each predicament as precarious as the next. But have the people of the Quad ever been trapped in fear or self-doubting?

222101024.content: Let me tell you a story.

222101025.content: When I sealed Chaos away, I pushed Astral Arcanum to its limits to create "Ruomu Tableau." Anything I felt in my heart could manifest in the painted realm, indistinguishable from reality. It was difficult to tell what was real.

222101026.content: Gengchen made a wager with me then that she could tell Ruomu Tableau from reality. I didn't believe her at first, because you'd see all the beauty you could ever hope for in that realm.

222101027.content: But she did see through it in the end. Then she left Nanjiao Isle to do what she thought was right.

222101028.content: When she left, I asked her how she knew she had really left the realm. For all she knew, she could still be in that painting.

222101029.content: Would you like to guess how she answered?

222101030.content: The chief has never once lost her direction.

222101031.content: Xihe nods, then heaves a sigh.

222101032.content: She said that, after living so long and watching as each era gave way to the next, she'd experienced enough happiness and hardship.

222101033.content: Whether it was a rocky reality or a beautiful daydream, all passed by in the blink of an eye. The future can only be found under your feet. The scene in her heart is what she has been doing every day for hundreds and thousands of years.

222101034.content: See the mountains and rivers in your heart, and so should the mountain and rivers be. Live with a clear conscious, and the journey won't be in vain.

222101035.content: Indeed. Live and let live. You're wiser than I thought, kid.

222101036.content: She raises her head and looks past the thick tree canopy and off into the sky. There, massive ring-shaped mechanisms hover quietly in the air.

222101037.content: Modifiers are not of this world, yet they experience it even more vividly. As far as Xu Heng is concerned, you young folks are the future.

222101038.content: Get moving. There's still much you can do before it's all too late...

122411003.content: The ascending mountain is about to strike Yu Jing when a bolt of light smashes it to pieces. Novich's smug smile freezes.

122411004.content: In the midst of a storm of rocks, figures descend, following the same path as that bolt of light. Novich blinks in recognition and rages.

122411005.content: You again! How do you mere weaklings continue to ruin my plans!?

122411006.content: Oh, Gremory... Was the girl really too strong for you?

122411007.content: I won't take the blame for this farce. Damned Odin... Damned...

122411008.content: Novich pulls the brim of his hat down low and beckons to a swamp of shadows lurking in the distance. Then he hurries towards where those two figures fell.

122411009.content: He moves quickly, but with caution. When he gets there he finds them both unconscious on the ground.

122411011.content: So, you thought you might escape? Just because I didn't get to kill you the first time?

122411012.content: Nobody's here to help you now. You don't even have the strength to sit up. How are you going to get away this time, huh?

122411013.content: Seeing no movement from either figure, Novich walks over, smirking. The red blade of Bane Energy he wields points at the neck of one of the two figures.

122411014.content:
You think you're the lucky one? The one who wouldn't die?
Let's see how you survive this, puny human!

122411015.content: The lucky one? Do you mean me?

122411017.content: A thin beam of light shoots out from the shadows surrounding a building. It disperses the Bane Energy condensed in Novich's hand and still retains enough power to send him staggering a dozen paces backwards.

122411018.content: Someone wearing a loose-fitting cloak steps out from where the light came from. Someone thin, with a girl's voice. But there are no other clues to her identity.

122411019.content: Killing them won't end well for you.

122411020.content: Who are you? What do you want?

122411021.content: Do you really need to ask a Mod such questions?

122411022.content: I have a deal for you. How about it?

122411023.content: A deal? You wanna make a deal with me?

122411024.content: I give you a chance to live. You save me a little time.

122411025.content: I'm taking these two with me. You want to kill them. So we fight or we trade. Your choice.

122411026.content: Those Visbanes behind you. Not too many, not too few. Not too close, not too far. It's obvious why they're here.

122411027.content: They're guarding you, but you don't want to be noticed, so you tell them to hide. All the same, you don't want to be without backup, so you tell them to stay close.

122411028.content: In short, if the people you're hiding from were to learn what you're up to... you'd be in trouble. And there wouldn't be anyone coming to save you. Am I right?

122411029.content: If you know everything already, why haven't you killed me? You're just bluffing.

122411030.content:
Yeah. I'm not sure if I can kill you.
But I'd be happy to give it a shot.

122411031.content: Although... Do you still have time?

122411032.content: The young woman in the cloak has been calmly approaching as she speaks. Novich is nervous, unsure of what to do, and he takes one step back for each of her steps forward. Soon, she is closer to the two figures on the ground than he is.

122411033.content: The young woman stops, but Novich keeps stepping backwards. Then his expression changes and he waves, as if beckoning something behind him to move forward.

122413001.content: Problem with your legs? You haven't moved far back enough yet.

122413002.content: Do you have to ruin everything!?

122413003.content: I think you've got things confused. Exactly who is doing the ruining here? Certainly not me.

122413004.content: Tell me who sent you! Aether Gazer or CORG?

122413005.content: You don't really expect me to answer that, do you?

122413006.content:
Now, time for you to make the decision.
Five. Four. Three...

122413007.content: Okay, fine. But just you wait...

122412001.content: Oh, he's run off. What a scaredy-cat.

122412003.content: She looks at the odd marks around the edge of the huge pit, then upwards at the floating rocks scattered in the space. She realizes something.

122412004.content: They used the transfer plans to cover up what was happening. Smarter than I expected.
