317151005.content: You shouldn't have gone behind my back to contact those agents, never mind let them go. They're the one problem we haven't solved yet.

317151007.content: Senba, those agents are a problem, and we have to deal with them.

317151009.content: ...The traitors have been taken care of. A number of those loyal to the family have either died or defected. Fortunately, we now have the situation under control.

317151010.content: The ones who are left are coming here in accordance with my original instructions. I'll take care of them myself if necessary.

317151011.content: No, that's enough. No more sacrifices.

317151012.content: Senba, I know that you can't bear to do it... That's why I issued those orders behind your back. That's why I've taken it upon myself to carry out our family's secret calling!

317151013.content: The tragedy four years ago happened because I was not single-minded enough to carry it out... But this time it's different. I'm different.

317151014.content: If I must commit a sin against those agents, too, then I will.

317151015.content: None of this has anything to do with you. This time, just do as I say, alright?

317151016.content: Karasugo Sendou's words, full of self-blame and regret, were also an earnest plea to the young woman in front of him. It seemed that no matter how many plans he hatched, ultimately she would be the one making the final decision.

317151017.content: I've never blamed you for what happened.

317151019.content: You should call me Izanami from now on.

317151020.content: Karasugo Sendou did not know what to say; and, surprised myself, I moved closer to the screen partition.

317151021.content: Why are you... now of all times...

317151022.content: Brother. Allow me to call you that one last time. I'm not completely unaware of all of your machinations over the last few days. This change is also very important for my plan.

317151023.content: Now... you've done enough. I made some changes to your first set of orders before they were sent out. The Karasugo servants who are now hurrying towards the gathering point believe that the person they are going to meet is Izanami.

317151024.content: What do you think you're doing? You're not supposed to reveal yourself!

317151025.content: Senba let out a soft sigh, a sigh that said that she had endless regrets, but that she'd come to terms with everything as well.

317151026.content: As someone who was once part of the Karasugo family, I have no regrets.

317151027.content: A distortion appeared in the room, and a giant portal manifested in front of Senba. In a flash, Karasugo Sendou was swept away to an unknown location.

317151028.content: Senba stopped for a moment, as if she was reminiscing about something one last time, and then turned and walked towards the door.

317151030.content: I broke through the screen partition with all my strength. A shocked Senba had stopped moving.

317151031.content: May I still call you Senba?

317151032.content: ...I'm Senba to you, Questioner. That's enough for me.

317151033.content: Just what are you thinking of doing?

317151034.content: I just want to put an end to all this... Don't worry about me. Just do what we agreed on and you'll be fine, Questioner. At the very least, you will be alright.

317151035.content: Senba thought for a moment, as if she was mulling over an important decision.

317151036.content: Hmm... Starting now, I think I will call you "Admin." After all, you've taken care of me like you took care of the other Modifiers.

317151037.content: The wall between us might have come down, but there was still a yawning crevasse between us.

317151039.content: I ran towards Senba, wanting to stop her. But I ran into a transparent wall instead.

317151040.content: It looks like I managed to fool you, Admin.

317151041.content: For a moment, it seemed like Senba might even break out into gleeful chuckles. And then the dejection returned to her face.

317151042.content: Alright, I'll admit it: I put that wall in at the last minute. Despite all of my planning, I'd forgotten to make your space as safe as it could be, Admin.

317151043.content: The dejection on Senba's face gave way to an undeniable sadness.

317151044.content: Perhaps I'd hoped I'd be able to bid you a proper farewell now.

317151045.content: Senba looked at me. There was nothing but resolve in her eyes.

317151047.content: All of the moments I had shared with Senba were flashing through in my mind, one after another. The last one I recalled was the memory of that story she'd told me, and the answer that had made me feel utterly powerless...

317151048.content: The girl claimed that she had written the sign herself. Then one morning, she sacrificed herself at the entrance to the market.

317151050.content: Senba walked through the door. As I screamed after her, I began to fall back into the boundless abyss...

317152001.content: The stairs were crumbling. The walls were coming down. All of the things that made up this dimension appeared to be disintegrating.

317152003.content: This is such a strange feeling.

317152004.content: The strange humanoid figure that had entangled everyone for so long suddenly reappeared, holding the dying Izanami in her arms and not allowing anyone to come near her.

317152007.content: The space around them began to churn, as if the air itself was being written over.

317161001.content: It all disappeared, leaving behind a blank space. It was as if an entire set of precious memories had been erased.

317161002.content: No, it hadn't been erased. Although there was nothing in front of me, I could still see clear, vivid images of what had happened in my mind.

317161003.content: The more I thought about it, the more I felt that familiar pain.

317161005.content: Incredible. Everyone's consciousness has been written over except for yours...

317161007.content: Looks like you don't need me to save you.

317161009.content: Karasugo Senba—that is, the Crow God Izanami—was just defeated.

317161010.content: Senba is not the Crow God!!

317161011.content: All of the clues in that space point to her being the Crow God. As do everyone's actions in there. Why can't you believe it?

317161012.content: I remembered what I had gone through, and yet, and I was still struggling inside.

317161013.content: I understand that. But between my memories and feelings, one of them is lying to me.

317161014.content: In a world like this, which one will tell the truth?

317161015.content: Kagutsuchi made no reply. It seemed like he couldn't answer the question, either.

317161016.content: Then there was a rumble, and crow feathers started falling out of the sky. The space was about to collapse.

317161017.content: Why is this happening? Did it not work after all?

317161018.content: Kagutsuchi looked over to me with the anticipation and a hint of indecision in his eyes.

317161019.content: I may be grasping at straws here, but what you just said may have created a new possibility.

317161021.content: Like I said when we first met, we shouldn't be enemies.

317161022.content: I'm just... an idler who's only working to fulfill a promise. But who knows—maybe my decision really can save the world this time.

317161023.content: Kagutsuchi solemnly handed me the katana that had been hanging at his waist.

317161024.content: Please, you may be the only one left in here who still has a chance of pulling this off. Once you leave this place, no matter what happens, you must find Izanami!

317161025.content: Please do what I've failed to do... Help her escape her fate.

317161026.content: I took his katana. Before I could say another word, the entire space around us shattered and collapsed.

317161027.content: Once again, Izuru Masayoshi was driven to the courtyard sanctuary to ease the fatigue caused by his official duties. However, the night breeze, though rejuvenating, also brought with it a degree of danger.

317161028.content: It's you. You know you could have summoned me, if this is official business. What brings your esteemed self here so late at night?

317161030.content: Izuru Masayoshi was looking up at the roof, where a young woman with a barely discernible smile on her face was nonchalantly perched.

317161031.content: I am obliged to accord the proper respect to the current Child of Heaven after all.

317161032.content: The young woman gave a slight nod. Though her facial expression remained relaxed, the authority in her demeanor was clear.

317161033.content: You can dispense with the formalities. I'm guessing the guards hiding around here are a recent addition? One made after that attempt on your life?

317161035.content: How troublesome. Get rid of them.

317161037.content: Despite the threat posed to his safety by the command, Izuru Masayoshi carried it out right away. Using a device he carried on him, he sent a signal to the guards around the courtyard that told them to leave.

317161038.content: Pray tell the reason for your visit, Child of Heaven.

317161039.content: Don't play dumb with me. Don't tell me you don't know what's going on with the Karasugo?

317161040.content: Izuru Masayoshi only answered after a slight pause.

317161041.content: There's no cause for worry, Child of Heaven. Your Divine Power is supreme, and the fact that you were hurt by that witch four years ago must have been a fluke. CORG will take care of this.

317161042.content: I told you, stop playing dumb with m— Were you just trying to probe me for my weaknesses?

317161043.content: I wouldn't dare, Child of Heaven! My only wish is to lessen your burden.

317161044.content: During the incident with the Akishika, all you had to do was to follow my plan and have that girl fight Suzugamori directly. I could've taken back all that belonged to me once that overweening human had been devoured.

317161045.content: Then, because of your negligence, someone else managed to swoop in. In the end I was left with nothing.

317161046.content: So tell me: Just how were you "lessening my burden" back then?

317161047.content: The air around Izuru Masayoshi grew still with foreboding. He wisely opted to remain silent.

317161048.content: Listen. The deal between us still stands, and you will get what is due to you in the end—provided you do exactly as I say.

317161049.content: I'll give you one more chance. Think carefully: Why would I come to you now about the Karasugo?

317161050.content: It took a while for Izuru Masayoshi to prepare his answer.

317161051.content: No matter which side of the Karasugo wins, you'll be their next target.

317161052.content: As for CORG's investigation into the Karasugo, they'll also eventually turn their attention to you, since you're right now Karasugo Haruka, the second daughter of the family.

317161053.content: It appears we can't hide the task you gave me any longer. We'll have to start immediately.

317161054.content: In which case, you're here to give me the go-ahead.

317161055.content: Izuru Masayoshi said this with absolute composure. Whatever the explosive information that could turn the outside world upside-down was, he had known for a very long time.

317161056.content: Very good. You always take the initiative to figure out what to do next. That's what I like about you.

317161057.content: The Child of Heaven was about to leave when Izuru Masayoshi suddenly took a step forward.

317161058.content: Allow me to say one more thing, Child of Heaven.

317161060.content: I humbly remind you that the Karasugo family appear to have gotten their hands on a substance that may pose a threat to you.

317161061.content: A Karasugo underling secretly gave this substance to Himiko. That was why, after the Deer God was defeated, you were unable to take back what was rightfully yours.

317161062.content: I beseech you to keep an eye out for that, lest you fall prey to the work of knaves.

317161063.content: Hmph. I've long known about that.

317161065.content: That child who tried to lay a hand on me at the Miyahebi mansion barely got away with his life. This isn't worth worrying about, and I certainly don't need you to look out for me.

317161067.content: Masayoshi, my child, you are the most competent member of your family I have seen in all these years. Don't go messing things up now.

317161068.content: The Child of Heaven spoke in a jocular tone, though it was unclear whether her utterance was a threat or a test. Again, Izuru Masayoshi fell silent for a long time.

317161069.content: I understand. This is all for the Izuru family—no, for the whole of Sasanami!

1107501001.content: (77, 78, 79... No, no, I missed a row of people there.)

1107501002.content: (Does that mean that there are more than a hundred folks ahead of me?!)

1107501003.content: (This must be some herbal tea I'm standing in line for!)

1107501004.content: I've been standing in front of the herbal tea shop on busy Pingkang Street for an hour and a half now. I let out a soft sigh.

1107501005.content: Looks like I won't get the chance to drink this herbal tea... (Coughs)

1107501007.content: Here, here, have some of this. Trust me. I ordered this sweet and sour pork with pineapple just for you, Admin! It's delicious!

1107501008.content: And here, have some of this. This is our local specialty, hot osmanthus wine...

1107501009.content: I'd been sent to Xu Heng for a negotiation at Tian Lu Traders, but a meal from the enthusiastic and insistent Luliang had to come first, it seemed. I quickly took a seat.

1107501010.content: But possibly because Luliang was so excited about the delicacies and the wine, we completely forgot about considering how much we could actually eat.

1107501011.content: And so, when the next day rolled around, I started to feel a burning sensation rising from my stomach to my throat...

1107501012.content: I'm so sorry, Admin! I'm so sorry!!!

1107501013.content: I promise to make it up to you when you recover...

1107501014.content: (I should come back another time. Maybe the line will be shorter on a weekday...)

1107501015.content: Just as I turn to leave, someone taps me on the shoulder.

1107501016.content: Oh hey, #{nickname}#! How are... you? Hmm.

1107501017.content: (Coughs) Oh, it's you, Mengzhang... I'm sorry... (Coughing fit)

1107501018.content: Yikes. That's a really bad cough you have. Is that from a chill or the heat? Please tell me it isn't consumption!

1107501020.content: Okay, okay, breathe. I was just joking... Here, I have some medicine you can use.

1107501021.content: I hurriedly unscrew the bottle of medicine Mengzhang hands to me and empty its contents into my mouth. The bitter powder hits my throat, and I feel my abdomen cramp up. It is a while before I'm able to open my mouth and speak again.

1107501022.content: I saw a sign put up by the herbal tea shop when I walked past earlier. It said their herbal tea is very effective for dispelling internal heat and detoxifying the body.

1107501023.content: So I wanted to try some. But I don't think it'll be easy for me to get any now.

1107501024.content: Hmm. Even the best-made herbal tea is just a health supplement. It won't be enough to cure you.

1107501025.content: Would you give me a prescription then, Doctor Mengzhang?

1107501026.content: I wouldn't dare! The wrong prescription will make your condition worse... I say, you already know the best doctor in Xu Heng. Why don't you go see her? She happens to be at home today.

1107501027.content: And so, I decide to walk all the way from the herbal tea shop to Lingguang's home. But I haven't gone very far when I bump into Lingguang on the street.

1107501030.content: I heard from Luliang that you're here on Aether Gazer business. I was actually on my way to Tian Lu Traders to visit you.

1107501032.content: How are the talks with Luliang going?

1107501034.content: Hmm. Admin, you seem quieter than usual today.

1107501035.content: I point to my throat in resignation, and as if on cue, it starts to act up.

1107501037.content: Lingguang leads me to a nearby bench so I can sit down. I describe my symptoms to her, and she motions for me to raise my head and open my mouth.

1107501038.content: Your throat is red and inflamed. There's also some mild esophageal reflux... Have you eaten anything strange recently?

1107501040.content: I let out a long sigh. With great difficulty, I tell her about how I'd eaten pineapple with hot osmanthus wine the day before.

1107501041.content: As I thought, it's food poisoning. Even if you're up for eating anything and everything, you still have to follow some basic rules...

1107501042.content: Fortunately, you didn't drink too much yesterday and your symptoms are quite mild. You can use the medicinal powder you got from Mengzhang to help relieve the symptoms. Come with me and I'll make a medicinal decoction for you. It will eliminate the root cause of your malaise.

1107501044.content: I'm so excited to hear "eliminate the root cause," I start coughing again. I start to reach for my terminal...

1107501045.content: How much... (coughs)... do I owe you... (coughs)

1107501046.content: Please, you don't have to do that. We aren't at Vermilion Wellness.

1107501047.content: I'm using medicinal herbs I grew myself, anyway. We doctors must do whatever we can when a patient is ill.

1107501048.content: I'm still feeling a little uneasy about this, when Lingguang hands me a bag full of vegetables.

1107501049.content: Why don't you help me bring this back home? For your payment.

1107501050.content: And so Lingguang and I return to her residence together, me carrying a small bag of produce, Lingguang holding a much bigger one.

1107501051.content: I'll go put together your prescription now. Wait here.

1107501052.content: With a flourish of her arm, a clay pot magically appears in Lingguang's hand. She calmly calls upon her Divine Power, and I watch as a variety of pills, powders, and medicinal herbs are added to the pot...

1107501053.content: A mellow flame forms between her fingers, and before long, the pleasant aroma of the liquid has reached my nose.

1107501056.content: Lingguang looks at me gulp down the medicine with a smile on her face. She gently taps me on the back to tell me to slow down.

1107501057.content: Ahh! Thank you, Doctor Lingguang... I'm feeling much better now! Look, now I can speak!

1107501058.content: The medicine will take some more time than that to kick in. But the psychological impact will also contribute to your recovery.

1107501059.content: It's a bit early, but since I don't get to host you very often, #{nickname}#, why don't you stay for lunch?

1107501061.content: Your respiratory system doesn't need any more irritation from being in the kitchen. The most important thing for you to do is rest.

1107501062.content: If we're talking about the vegetables we just brought back, I don't think it'll cause any irritation...

1107501063.content: I look down and see bell pepper, yam, corn, and leeks... The sight of all these colorful fruits and vegetables scream "healthy" to me.

1107501066.content: Um... Is this all you're using for it?

1107501067.content: Hot pot is actually the healthiest way of cooking. It's only become the way it is now because people wanted more and more flavor in it...

1107501068.content: Do you not like it, Admin? We can have something else instead.

1107501069.content: No, no, it's just... this is a kind of hot pot that one would only see at your place.

1107501070.content: That's true. Usually when I have hot pot with other people, there's a lot more meat. I only have hot pot this way at home.

1107501071.content: You're the first person to share hot pot with me at my place, Admin. You must tell me what you think of it.

1107501072.content: Lingguang strokes her chin. She does look quite eager to hear my opinion.

1107501073.content: I'm the first person to have hot pot at Lingguang's...? This is getting a little stressful...

1107501074.content: I had a taste of your cooking the first time I came to Xu Heng. I'm sure that even if what you make only uses veggies, it will be delicious!

1107501075.content: But if you don't like it, #{nickname}#, don't force yourself to eat it. Otherwise I won't treat you to a meal again!

1107501076.content: Seeing that I'm sitting upright now, Lingguang smiles and teasingly pokes at my forehead, then starts to take out the ingredients from the bags.

1107501077.content: I bought enough food for a couple of meals... Let's have these today.

1107501078.content: Hold on... Are those medicinal herbs I see?

1107501079.content: These? These are angelica root, astralagus, goji berries, and dangshen root. They're good for your health, and will add a bit flavor to the base broth too.

1107501080.content: ...A tasty AND healthy meal, I see.

1107501081.content: #{nickname}#... Do you think I'm being fussy? Because I have to have medicinal herbs in a meal as simple as hot pot...?

1107501082.content: No, not at all. I'm just in awe at how much care you take, that's all.

1107501083.content: If I had someone like you by my side, Lingguang, I wouldn't have been coughing all morning like I did today...

1107501084.content: I rub my throat, take a deep breath, and let out a pretend cough. Lingguang and I look at each other and laugh.

1107501085.content: ...If you make a joke about sickness again, I'll make the hot pot base out of a medicinal decoction instead.

1107501087.content: Oh... Sit over here and give me your hand. I'll check your pulse.

1107501088.content: I nod and do as she says.

1107501089.content: Remember that other time I took your pulse, Admin? The first time you came to Xu Heng?

1107501090.content: Yeah. I think you said I had poor energy flow or something like that... Don't worry, I'm in good health. My heart rate, blood pressure, and everything else is normal.

1107501091.content: And do you also remember that I said an overly optimistic patient can be problematic for a physician, too?

1107501092.content: Is that what you think of me...?

1107501093.content: Yes. So bear with me while I nag you a little more. For the next three days, you should refrain from eating meat and spicy food.

1107501094.content: If you feel the cough returning, all you need to take a syrup made of yellow Himalayan fritillary, loquat, and white pear. But remember never to eat so recklessly again... (Yawns)

1107501095.content: Have you not been sleeping well?

1107501096.content: I'm alright, thanks for asking. I get a little lethargic on my days off. Maybe I'm just a little tired from managing the medicinal herbs at Vermilion Wellness... I'm going to make some tea.

1107501097.content: Lingguang gently rubs her temples a few times, then stands up and goes to the cupboard to get some tea.

1107501098.content: I'll be in Xu Heng for a few more days. Let me know if you need any help. Don't be shy to ask.

1107501100.content: Come by whenever you have some free time.

1107502001.content: I'm hungry again. I must've had too little at breakfast.

1107502002.content: The aroma of the corn crisps is just too tempting.

1107502003.content: Hmm... These crisps are really good. I've never had anything so tasty before.

1107502004.content: These are made from a type of corn grown here in Xu Heng, called amber corn. It's sweeter than regular corn and has a softer, more pillowy texture.

1107502005.content: We'll have amber corn for hot pot today, too. You'll get to taste it soon, Admin.

1107502006.content: Ah, a Xu Heng specialty. I must get me some before I go.

1107502007.content: Maybe I'll get ten packs... Nah, five will be enough. I can't overfill my bags again...

1107502008.content: What's with the frown, Admin? Is something bothering you?

1107502009.content: Seeing Lingguang's look of concern shuts my brain down for a brief moment. Then I recount to her the embarrassing story of the last time I departed from Xu Heng.

1107502010.content: So you're telling me that you were stopped by the staff at the Photon Rail station for a secondary check because your luggage was too heavy? And that almost delayed the train's departure?

1107502011.content: Yes, I had a huge box of local specialties and souvenirs. I completely forgot about the weight limit, and I forgot to weigh my baggage beforehand.

1107502012.content: And you were not discovered by the staff until you'd passed the security check at the Photon Rail station, correct?

1107502014.content: I sheepishly scratch my face in embarrassment. However, Lingguang just looks at me with a gentle smile.

1107502015.content: So how were things resolved in the end?

1107502016.content: I surpassed the limit by a little over 500 grams, so I ate up that amount in the station.

1107502017.content: I managed to clear the secondary check then and got on the Photon Rail. Only thing was, this was just after a meal, so it made my stomach hurt...

1107502018.content: Lingguang laughs out loud again at my answer.

1107502019.content: Well, if you go over the weight limit again and have to resort to the same solution, remember to use the digestion aid I gave you.

1107502020.content: Oh, by the way, would you tell me about some of the things you've seen and heard in the other Sephirah Zones? I'd really love to know.

1107502021.content: Seeing Lingguang's interest, I proceed to chat with her about my previous travel experiences in Ain Soph, Omorfies, Sasanami...

1107502022.content: And every once in a while, Lingguang stops me to ask questions about what she's heard.

1107502023.content: After some time spent in conversation, I start to feel a little thirsty, and Lingguang offers to go to the living room to get me more tea.

1107502024.content: I stand up and look around the room, which is decorated in a classic, elegant style. Almost all the furniture here is made of wood. On the coffee table, there are several rather old-looking books on medicine, and a calming fragrance is coming from the hill censer in the corner.

1107502025.content: There's also a guqin placed next to the coffee table, which has an open book of music scores on it. Clearly, Lingguang is someone who also likes music.

1107502026.content: (Is this where Lingguang usually does her reading? You don't see many physical books around these days...)

1107502027.content: According to the time stamp on the holographic nutrition and pharmacology file that's still open, she's been flipping through it for more than 12 hours.

1107502028.content: Don't tell me she didn't sleep at all last night...

1107502029.content: I did sleep. I just forgot to close the file, that's all.

1107502030.content: As I'm mumbling to myself and sighing, a red silhouette suddenly appears behind me.

1107502031.content: !!! I didn't see you come back, Lingguang.

1107502032.content: Lingguang, who's holding a teapot now, just tilts her head slightly as if I'd said something odd.

1107502033.content: I came in just a moment ago. The way you were examining the file was so adorable, Admin, I couldn't help myself from watching you for a while.

1107502034.content: I really couldn't understand what's in that file...

1107502035.content: Ha. I'll placed your tea here. Be careful—I just made it, so it's quite hot.

1107502036.content: Thank you. All those corn crisps have made me a little thirsty...

1107502037.content: Mmm! This tea's lovely. Not only does it have a mellow taste, it also leaves behind a slightly sweet aftertaste.

1107502038.content: I'm glad you like it. Do make yourself at home and help yourself to anything you need.

1107502039.content: If you're interested, you can take a look at any of the books here. It's getting late, so I'll start prepping the ingredients for the hot pot now.

1107502040.content: Let me help. I'd feel a little rude, just sitting here and waiting to be fed.

1107502041.content: And I'm better now. Look at how easily I was able to tell you all those stories just now. I didn't even cough once!

1107502043.content: That's alright. And many hands make light work.

1107502044.content: Alright. I'll leave the washing and chopping of the vegetables to you then, Admin. I'll make the dipping sauce. We can start eating when the broth starts boiling.

1107502045.content: Perhaps feeling it's a bit odd to serve her guest just veggies, Lingguang brings some chicken and fish to the table as well. We end up having quite the feast.

1107502046.content: While I was nominally given the task of prepping the veggies, in truth, all I end up doing is placing them into the correct slots in the automatic kitchen machine, which did the actual job of washing and cutting. Then I cut those pieces into thinner slices or strips based on Lingguang's instructions.

1107502047.content: I bring the cut veggies back to the table, and my appetite is further whetted by the sight of the prawns, green mussels, and chopped fish pieces that Lingguang has readied. I've come at just the right time too, as the broth is ready.

1107502048.content: The steaming soup, speckled with ruby-like goji berries, is bubbling away vigorously.

1107502049.content: You can start cooking the ingredients now, Admin...

1107502050.content: Under Lingguang's watchful gaze, I dip my food in the dipping sauce, then put it in my mouth. I then take care to chew slowly.

1107502052.content: How does it taste, Admin? Do you like it?

1107502053.content: It's delicious! It has just the right amount of savoriness, and all these flavors, too! They just keep——Hmm?

1107502054.content: What is it, Admin? Are you not feeling well?

1107502055.content: ...No, I'm fine. I just tasted something bitter, that's all. And the tip of my tongue is kind of numb.

1107502056.content: Ah, I didn't manage to cloak the taste of the medicinal herbs after all... But if I were to reduce the amount of herbs I used...

1107502057.content: Lingguang, her head lowered, is murmuring to herself. But she quickly returns her attention to me.

1107502058.content: Oh, Admin, I'm sorry. If the food's too bitter, try this.

1107502059.content: Lingguang fishes out a piece of plum candy from out of nowhere, like she's performing a magic trick. She then peels off the wrapper and tries to place the candy in my mouth.

1107502060.content: Um, I can do that myself...

1107502061.content: (Chuckles) Didn't I just feed you those corn crisps? Come now, Admin, say "aah"...

1107502063.content: As I look at Lingguang's "just listen to me" smile, I can't help but open my mouth.

1107502065.content: I've got more if you want them, Admin.

1107502066.content: Once again, Lingguang conjures up a few pieces of plum candy into her open palm. It looks like she wants to continue feeding me...

1107502067.content: Say, aren't we having dinner now? Maybe I shouldn't be having so much candy now...

1107502069.content: Lingguang slowly puts down the candy and gives me an apologetic smile.

1107502070.content: I'm sorry about that. I guess I'm not great at making hot pot... Let me make something else for you, Admin. It'll just be a short while.

1107502071.content: Huh? But you've done a great job.

1107502072.content: Didn't you say that the food was bitter?

1107502073.content: A little, yes. But a little bitterness adds to the experience!

1107502074.content: Although the broth is slightly bitter because of the medicinal herbs, once you get used to it, it actually leaves you feeling fresh afterwards.

1107502075.content: Thank you, Admin. But you don't have to say that to make me feel better. The only way to improve something is by listening to critique. So...

1107502076.content: It seems like it'd be faster to prove my words with my actions, so I pick up my chopsticks again.

1107502077.content: I pick out a piece of fish from the pot and put it in my mouth. I want to prove my point so badly, I forget to dip it in the sauce and——

1107502080.content: Lingguang swiftly pours me a cup of chilled herbal tea so I can wash down the fire in my mouth.

1107502081.content: Why were you in such a hurry? Only children do that.

1107502082.content: Even though she's reprimanding me, I hear only distress in Lingguang's voice.

1107502083.content: I can't let you burn yourself again, Admin...

1107502085.content: Lingguang gently takes the chopsticks from my hand, then smoothly picks up another piece of meat from the pot.

1107502087.content: Lingguang blows at the steaming-hot piece of meat, then carefully dips it in the sauce before delivering it to my mouth.

1107502088.content: Now you can't scald yourself again.

1107502090.content: Although being treated like a child makes me somewhat uncomfortable, I open my mouth anyway. This is something I could get used to...

1107502091.content: By the way, Lingguang, what made you think of adding medicinal herbs to hot pot? Is because you're a physician?

1107502092.content: (Chuckles) I suppose you could say that.

1107502093.content: At the Quad, we all have very different roles and personalities. But quite often, these personalities don't take very good care of their health and well-being.

1107502094.content: I can remind them to take better care of themselves while on the job, but old habits die hard.

1107502095.content: Oh, don't say that, Lingguang. And you must remember to take care of yourself while taking care of others, too.

1107502096.content: I look at Lingguang. Her smile is wan, despite her best efforts to hide it.

1107502097.content: The same goes for you, Admin.

1107502098.content: This moment of mutual honesty and openness between us is soon over, as we sputter into laughter while looking into each other's eyes.

1107502099.content: So, I suppose, yes, it comes from me being a physician. I keep wanting to make something that will help people become healthier.

1107502100.content: Over the years, everyone at the Quad has developed a spicier palette thanks to our chief, and I thought that the stronger flavors of the base broth would mask the bitter taste of the herbs.

1107502101.content: ...But I guess it's not as simple as I thought.

1107502102.content: You'll figure it out, I'm sure. You're a doctor, after all.

1107502104.content: Lingguang looks at me blankly for a moment, then smiles.

1107502105.content: That's right. If you like it, #{nickname}#, I'm sure that I'll succeed.

1107502106.content: Also, if your cough comes back tomorrow, I won't be at home. But you can come see me at Vermilion Wellness.

1107502107.content: Oh... But it's the weekend. Are you seeing patients?

1107502108.content: We tend to see more patients during weekends, so I always go to Vermilion Wellness to make sure everything goes well.

1107502109.content: Are you very short-handed? Tell you what—You've taken care of me all day today. I'll come and lend you a hand tomorrow.

1107502110.content: It's alright, I'm used to working weekends. I just want everyone to be healthy. That includes you, Admin.

1107502111.content: Lingguang rejects my proposal with a smile. But for some reason, I'm not ready to leave things at that.

1107502112.content: You know, I was so glad I ran into you that morning. I felt so relieved.

1107502113.content: I think any patient would feel like that. If they have a good doctor who's able to promptly relieve their pain, the satisfaction of being cured will erase all of the worries and anxiety they've been having.

1107502114.content: So let me help you, too. Many hands make light work, after all—and Vermilion Wellness will be able to help more patients that way, too.

1107502116.content: I must warn you, the work at Vermilion Wellness can be difficult.

1107502117.content: Are we talking about highly technical or medical duties here?

1107502118.content: Not terribly technical, though you need to have some basic medical knowledge.

1107502119.content: Since you're so insistent, however, let's give it a try, Admin. I'll tell you more about what you need to know later.

1107502120.content: Alright, thank you. I promise to listen carefully!

1107502121.content: I should be the one saying thank you, Admin.

1107502122.content: Thank you for coming to help, and... helping me see the light.

1107503001.content: The next day. I head for Vermilion Wellness after a quick tidying-up of my room.

1107503002.content: The iconic building is visible even from a distance. I push open its dark blue doors and see Lingguang waiting when I enter, standing amidst tall, lush greenery.

1107503003.content: This... is Vermilion Wellness? A "modest little medical hall," you said?

1107503004.content: We started out as a small medical hall. We only expanded our operations in the past couple of years.

1107503005.content: It really is quite different from the place my parents founded all those years ago.

1107503006.content: The premises look spacious and clean. There's a tall and eye-catching signboard, and over half of the hall's space is taken over by a dozen medicine cabinets.

1107503007.content: The staff and doctors are busy tending to the patients who've come for medical consultation, and all of them greet Lingguang warmly when they see her.

1107503008.content: Doctor Lingguang, you're finally here! We've already seen over 100 patients since we opened in the morning. I'm afraid there will be even more in the afternoon.

1107503009.content: Thank you for your hard work, everyone. Let's take turns for your breaks. I'll be on duty in the afternoon, so everything should go well.

1107503010.content: Take a seat, Admin. You'll partner with me in a minute. I'll perform the consult, and you'll write down my prescription, alright?

1107503012.content: I learn the format of a prescription very quickly. However, things aren't as simple as I thought they'd be.

1107503013.content: You have jaundice, which is very common. You will need to make a decoction out of fifty grams of Chinese lobelia and fifty grams of Cogon grass root. That will give you two doses, which you should take with some sugar.

1107503014.content: (Yikes, I can't keep up with what Lingguang is saying. I'm not even sure what she said after the word "jaundice"...)

1107503015.content: Admin, have you finished writing down the prescription?

1107503019.content: I'll try to speak more slowly when dictating prescriptions. If there's anything you don't understand, Admin, do not hesitate to ask me.

1107503020.content: ...You're suffering from internal heat that has made you fatigued. Make a decoction with twenty-five grams of ginseng and fifteen grams each of magnolia berry and dwarf lilyturf in water.

1107503021.content: Hold on, Lingguang. Did you say "magnolia berry" or just "magnolia"?

1107503023.content: Okay, good, I got it that time.

1107503024.content: If you don't have any more questions, I'll continue. Red sage, Sichuan lovage, Siberian ginseng...

1107503025.content: Two hours later, Lingguang and I finally get our brief break.

1107503026.content: Although you made a few mistakes, I can tell that you're trying very hard, Admin.

1107503027.content: Hmm, what is this... "SC lovage"... Oh, do you mean Sichuan lovage?

1107503029.content: Don't worry about it. We physicians do use shorthand from time to time for the sake of efficiency. We just have to make sure that our shorthand can be understood by others, too.

1107503030.content: I'll take care of writing prescriptions now. They told me that the pharmacy's very busy, so why don't you help out with dispensing the prescriptions instead?

1107503031.content: Dispensing the prescriptions? That should be easy! I'll head over there right now.

1107503032.content: Two hours later, it's clear that I spoke way too soon.

1107503033.content: Ugh, it's impossible to tell these herbs apart! They all look the same!

1107503034.content: Both Chinese snake gourd and shanyao yam come in thin white pieces, while ricebeans and acacia seeds look no different from red beans.

1107503035.content: (How in the world would I know which is which???)

1107503036.content: We aren't making bubble tea here. If I give the wrong medicine, someone might die.

1107503037.content: With this in mind, I steel myself and take the time to reinforce my knowledge between prescriptions.

1107503038.content: I'm so focused on getting the right medicines and double-checking the prescriptions, I'm completely miss the moment Lingguang comes to stand next to me.

1107503039.content: How's dispensing prescriptions going so far? Are you still getting used to it?

1107503040.content: Oh, I made a couple of careless mistakes. But now I'm finally able to identify the herbs...

1107503042.content: Yeah... Some of them happened because I didn't remember things correctly, some of them were because I wasn't paying attention...

1107503043.content: The smile disappears from Lingguang's face, and she sighs. It's not very often that I see this expression on her face, and I can't help but feel nervous. But there's no stern rebuke from her.

1107503044.content: Of course, everyone makes mistakes. I remember when I first started practicing medicine. I think my performance then was even worse than yours today, Admin.

1107503046.content: Yes. When I was young, I only knew that doctors were highly respected. But I didn't know how hard this job is.

1107503047.content: I was armed with theories and knowledge and had all kinds of fantastic notions about what being a physician is like. Reality hit me hard.

1107503048.content: Wrong diagnoses, mixing up medicinal herbs, getting reprimanded: I experienced it all.

1107503049.content: But, you know, when you make a mistake here, you can't merely reflect on your mistakes and take your time to learn. Because we're dealing with patients' health and lives here.

1107503050.content: Therefore, although it's understandable that not having enough experience will result in more mistakes, we must also make sure that the patient gets the right medicine. Even if it means that we have to work more slowly.

1107503052.content: Lingguang holds up a fruit from the dispensing box in front of me and bites into it like it's a snack.

1107503053.content: This isn't in the prescription you're holding in your hand.

1107503055.content: Without thinking, I follow suit and pick up a fruit I don't recognize from the box, place it in my mouth, and start chewing it.

1107503056.content: Mmm, it's a little bitter. I can taste licorice and a bit of saltiness as well... I know what this is now! This is European mistletoe.

1107503057.content: I repeat the name silently to myself as I take out my terminal to note it down.

1107503059.content: Lingguang tilts her head in surprise and stares at me.

1107503060.content: Many medicinal herbs are poisonous. Aren't you afraid something bad will happen if you taste them just like that?

1107503061.content: But as long as I spit it out in time, I'll be okay, right? Learning the herbs by taste makes it less likely that I'll repeat my mistakes and make more trouble for you and your colleagues, Lingguang.

1107503062.content: (Chuckles) I must say, you have a gift for this, Admin.

1107503063.content: Does this count as professional recognition? If so, I'll report to the medical center immediately when I get back to Aether Gazer.

1107503064.content: Very funny. Now get ready—there are more patients waiting.

1107503066.content: With the encouragement from Lingguang, I continue to work on dispensing prescriptions with my confidence renewed. Before I know it, the entire afternoon has passed.

1107503067.content: The crowd in the office begins to thin, and the doctors and other staff members can finally take things easy, chatting or drinking tea.

1107503068.content: Good job, Admin. It's been especially busy today. Thank goodness you were here to help.

1107503069.content: I didn't expect the job to be so difficult, to be honest. I'm just happy that I didn't complicate matters too much... I'll have another cup of tea.

1107503070.content: Doctor Lingguang, we're finished for the day. Here are today's bills.

1107503071.content: Hmm? Who is this...? I don't think I've seen you around here before.

1107503072.content: Oh, this is my assistant. This is their first time visiting Vermilion Wellness.

1107503073.content: Oh??? Amazing. You actually learned all of the medicinal herbs in our inventory after only half a day?

1107503074.content: Lingguang looks up and nods with a smile, then looks at me approvingly.

1107503075.content: Admin, could you take that teapot right next to you and come with me to the back, please?

1107503076.content: I nod, pick up the teapot, and go to Lingguang.

1107503077.content: I push open the back door of Vermilion Wellness. I feel a light breeze scented with the aroma of plants blow in my face.

1107503078.content: I see a large swathe of medicinal plants growing in the open space in front of the hall. Everything is lush and green, and gently dancing in the wind.

1107503079.content: There must be thousands of plants here!

1107503080.content: What are you looking at, Admin? You seem fascinated.

1107503081.content: All of these medicinal plants. Did you grow all of them yourself, Lingguang?

1107503082.content: No. These are all gifts from the people we've helped here at Vermilion Wellness.

1107503083.content: We dispense medicine free of charge on the first and 15th day of every month to help patients in need. Sometimes, someone will offer to repay us, but since we don't accept gifts at the clinic, I allow them to grow medicinal plants here instead.

1107503084.content: Once the plants are grown, they can be used as medicine. Anyone who needs them can just pluck them and plant new seeds. This way, we'll have a never-ending cycle.

1107503085.content: A never-ending cycle to help people. What a wonderful idea.

1107503086.content: Speaking of which, you've been hard at work all day. You mustn't return empty-handed. I'll give you some herbs. You can decoct them when you get back home—they're good for your stomach and throat.

1107503087.content: But surely I have to pay for my medicine since I'm at Vermilion Wellness now.

1107503088.content: How about I take a plant as a souvenir? I'll try growing something too.

1107503089.content: …That works. I have some seeds, as well as some gardening tools, inside. I'll go and get them for you.

1107503090.content: Because I can't identify the plants, I take some time to look around before choosing what I want. Finally, I pull out a handful of sturdy-looking seedlings with great care.

1107503091.content: This plant over here. It looks tasty. The leaves look tender too.

1107503092.content: This is Japanese catnip. It has a slightly astringent flavor. Our animal companions are very fond of it.

1107503093.content: Catnip... I wonder if Mimir will go nuts over it...

1107503094.content: Under Lingguang's guidance, I loosen the soil in one spot and sow some new seeds.

1107503095.content: These are the plants others have planted. Over here, Luliang has planted honeysuckle because she says it will bring her prosperity and help Tian Lu Traders prosper.

1107503096.content: Her wish came true, then. But was it really because of the honeysuckle?

1107503097.content: Mengzhang says that he has no need for herbs, as he never falls sick. So instead he sowed some canola greens in this spot, which he says he wants to eat with noodles.

1107503098.content: Canola greens... Oh, you mean choy sum. Yeah, they should go well with the noodles Mengzhang likes.

1107503099.content: And then here are the trumpet flowers that Jianbing nurtured. They've grown to cover the entire wall.

1107503100.content: Beautiful. This is very in line with his character too.

1107503101.content: Oh? Did it actually bear fruit...?

1107503102.content: Lingguang stretches her hand into the middle of the plants, looking pleased as pie, and pulls out something. I come nearer to take a closer look and see a cone-shaped fruit, which is iridescent like mother-of-pearl.

1107503103.content: That looks interesting. Is it a new variety of chili pepper?

1107503104.content: This is a special variety brought back from Tikala. It's a cross between regular chili pepper and dill. It's not an easy plant to grow.

1107503105.content: I transplanted the seedlings here but have had no progress for several months. I wasn't expecting to see actual peppers today.

1107503106.content: Your hard work has paid off... But why grow this, Lingguang? When it's such a challenging plant to take care of?

1107503107.content: Lingguang's beautiful eyebrows relax slightly, and she returns to straightening up the plants.

1107503108.content: Xu Heng nurtures all living things. Birds, animals, insects, fish, plants, and trees can all find a home here.

1107503109.content: This little one is also a living thing. And since it's come to us here at Vermilion Wellness, we have a duty to take good care of it.

1107503110.content: ...Maybe it understands the work you've put into it, and this is its way of thanking you.

1107503111.content: We linger in this space for a while, marveling at this green ocean of life in front of us.

1107503112.content: It is dusk by the time Lingguang and I are done with the garden and bid goodbye to each other.

1107504001.content: A few days later, I am completely recovered and decide to pay Lingguang a visit to thank her.

1107504002.content: I should also mention that the negotiation with Luliang went very well. To apologize for accidentally poisoning me, Luliang asked me to pick something from her place as a gift.

1107504003.content: Huh? Just this music score? But that's barely anything...

1107504004.content: It's the thought that counts, Boss Luliang. I should be the one thanking you, for the great concession you're making.

1107504005.content: "It's the thought that counts," huh? Okay. Well, you can count on me, Administrator! I'll make sure everything goes off without a hitch. See you!

1107504006.content: I think about the guqin I saw at Lingguang's place a few days earlier, and know instantly whom I want to give this score to.

1107504007.content: I practically jog to Lingguang's place and ring the doorbell. But no one answers.

1107504008.content: (That's odd... Lingguang doesn't seem the type who would sleep in this late...)

1107504009.content: The clock on my terminal tells me it's noontime. Just as I'm still wondering if I should go to Vermilion Wellness, the door is gently pushed open by a housekeeper-type AGI Mecha, which are unique to Xu Heng.

1107504010.content: A woman with her hair over the place... wearing pajamas, wrapped in bandages, her face covered... staggers towards me.

1107504011.content: I rub my eyes in disbelief and look at my terminal again. No, it's undoubtedly not the middle of the night right now.

1107504012.content: Then I look at the house number again. This is indeed the house I visited just a few days ago. I'm definitely at the right place.

1107504014.content: Lingguang takes a few steps towards me. She's about to walk into the door... I quickly step forward and reach out with my arms.

1107504019.content: She opens her eyes a smidge to look at me, and the sleepiness is gone from her face in an instant...

1107504021.content: I would never have imagined Lingguang had this side to her as well.

1107504022.content: I'm so sorry, Admin... I didn't sleep well last night again.

1107504024.content: I ask this as soon as Lingguang is done with her morning routine.

1107504025.content: Don't blame yourself, please... I shouldn't have come unannounced...

1107504027.content: Is this because you've been working too hard recently...?

1107504028.content: No, I've been irresponsible. I was up rather late playing the guqin...

1107504029.content: Ahem... I've long heard that you like to play, Lingguang, but I've never had the chance to actually hear you.

1107504030.content: Seeing that Lingguang and I are about to enter an endless cycle of apologizing to each other, I quickly change the topic and tell her the purpose of my visit.

1107504031.content: So, I just got my hands on this.

1107504032.content: A music score for the guqin?

1107504033.content: A surprised Lingguang takes the score from my hands and starts to look through it with a smile on her face.

1107504034.content: How did you get ahold of this, Admin? This looks like the score for "Of the Troubles in the World." It's a Xu Heng tune that was lost long ago.

1107504035.content: Luliang wanted me to pick a gift as an apology from her. I remembered that you had a guqin, so I chose this and brought it over.

1107504036.content: Are you sure... you want to give this to me?

1107504037.content: Take it. Luliang was just saying that this isn't worth very much money...

1107504038.content: The value of the score doesn't lie in how much it costs. To me, this is the greatest gift...

1107504039.content: You're too kind. Please, come in for some tea.

1107504040.content: I nod, pick up my tea cup, and stand beside Lingguang to read the music score with her.

1107504041.content: She starts humming as she reads the notes. She's so immersed in the music, she presses three fingers on her right hand together and conducts the beat from time to time.

1107504042.content: But midway through the score, a frown appears on Lingguang's face.

1107504043.content: I looked through this on my way here, and I thought that the changes here are a little abrupt. I'm afraid whoever made this copy must have made a mistake...

1107504044.content: Oh? Are you knowledgeable about music too, Admin?

1107504045.content: I've been hitting the antique market with Mengzhang recently, so I've picked up a few things here and there about the guqin.

1107504046.content: Have you heard of Master Zhuo Yun?

1107504048.content: Lingguang freezes. Her mouth is slightly agape.

1107504049.content: Are you acquainted with him too, doctor?

1107504051.content: Lingguang lowers her gaze and nods in the affirmative.

1107504053.content: Amazing. You travel in such rarefied circles. You even know Master Zhuo Yun.

1107504054.content: But I suppose that's nothing to be surprised about, since you have been to so many places.

1107504055.content: I'm quite fond of his music. You know, Lingguang, the last time I was at the antique market, there were many guqin players playing Master Zhuo Yun's compositions.

1107504056.content: Mengzhang and I were there listening to them for quite a while.

1107504057.content: Ahaha... I didn't know you liked Master Zhuo Yun's music that much, Admin. I can play a tune or two for you.

1107504058.content: His compositions are beautiful and stirring... Master Zhuo Yun must also be a person of refined taste and elegance.

1107504060.content: For some reason, Lingguang suddenly turns her head away, and there's an awkward silence between us.

1107504063.content: By the way, Lingguang, do you think you can introduce me to this Master Zhuo Yun?

1107504064.content: I asked Mengzhang to do so, but he just gave me this secretive smile and ran off. Why is that you're also——

1107504069.content: I turn beet-red from my hairline all the way to my neck as I recall the barrage of compliments I just gave Master Zhuo Yun.

1107504071.content: Well, Admin. I'm happy to play for you if you like.

1107504072.content: There's a hint of shyness reddening Lingguang's cheeks, though she takes my hand in hers with a smile.

1107504073.content: For some reason, I sense a hint of cunning in Lingguang's manner today.

1107504074.content: But... isn't there something wrong with this copy of the music score?

1107504075.content: I flip back a few pages and express my concerns.

1107504076.content: It doesn't matter. I have it all in my head, anyway.

1107504077.content: Lingguang pulls her long hair to her back and ties it up gently with a ribbon before starting her performance.

1107504078.content: Her fingers fly over the strings of her guqin. It's as if a great wind has arisen in the world, and the eagles are soaring.

1107504079.content: As I gaze at her from the side, bit by bit I lose myself in the music.

1107504080.content: She's a physician who works tirelessly to promote knowledge of medicine and heal the people.

1107504081.content: She's the fiery deputy of South Isle at the Quad and a powerful Modifier who is protecting Xu Heng.

1107504082.content: (Although the Administrator is a human, they stand with the Modifiers regardless, disregarding the danger...)

1107504083.content: With great passion, Lingguang left behind an easy life and turned to squarely face the suffering of the people instead.

1107504085.content: (As you are lucky enough to experience this moment of leisure...)

1107504086.content: (Allow me to speak to you through my music...)

1107504087.content: When she reaches the two pages that were copied incorrectly, Lingguang simply plays a pleasant transition, preserving the music's captivating sound.

1107504088.content: The look in her eyes is serious and determined. Her music is melodious yet resolute, and her fingers continue to dance nimbly over the strings of her guqin.

1107504089.content: I close my eyes. I feel like I can see dark clouds parting, and all of humanity rising above pain.

1107504090.content: Oh... and of course, I also heard the sound of our empty stomachs.

1107504092.content: Um, yeah... Sorry to spoil the mood like that...

1107504093.content: We should do what our mood tells us, when it does. It's enough that you were willing to listen to me play this song. What do you want to eat?

1107504094.content: It'd be nice to have something spicy after all the bland food I've had over the past few days.

1107504095.content:
Tsk, but you've barely recovered.
Come inside—I'll make you hot pot again.

1107504096.content: I've been trying to come up with a new base broth over the past few days. This version is fairly spicy, but not too much. It should satisfy your craving.

1107504097.content: It's natural to want to satisfy one's food cravings, but staying healthy is the most important thing. And remember, you need a healthy body to be able to enjoy good food.

1107504098.content: After putting away her guqin, Lingguang stands, takes me by the hand, and brings me inside. She turns around with a smile and winks at me.

1107504099.content: So, listen to the doctor, alright?

910701001.content: Alright, don't move, dear Admin. Let me think this over a little more.

910701002.content: ... Did you put a sticker on me so you can sell me to the shops?

910701003.content: Of course not. I just wanted to buy myself a gift, but I don't know how much this one will cost me.

910701005.content: Oh, no, no, no. You look much more valuable than that to me.

910701006.content: Besides, who said the price has to be a number... How about this?

910701010.content: Oof, already? You have to train yourself up a little more.

910701011.content: Anytime you want more, know that I'm always here...

910701012.content: Promise me... If you don't like salty food, don't add so much braised pork belly the next time you have noodles!!!

910701013.content: Ha! Looks like my dear Admin's lost again.

910701014.content: Ugh... How can you just stand there and watch?

910701015.content: Was I supposed to do something else?!

910701016.content: Besides, I don't like games of chance. I prefer something I have control over.

910701017.content: Like trying to catch goldfish for two hours at a festival, like you did that other time?

910701018.content: ... Heh heh, I didn't know you were so interested in me. But surely, it'd be more fair if you gave me something in exchange for that little secret of mine?

910701019.content: Hm... Oh, look! Something's off about the ceiling, don't you think?

910701021.content: Admin? You remember last night now?

910701022.content: Wakey-wakey! Did I ask too much of you yesterday?

910701023.content: It was stupid of me to try and keep up with a Modifier over drinks...

910701024.content: My head hurts. I don't want to go anywhere today.

910701025.content: No way. If your head hurts, I know a place where you can relax...

910701026.content: Huh?! Wait, let me change my clothes first...

910701027.content: I think sitting in a hot spring will just make my headache worse... Hold on!!!

910701028.content: Don't get so close to me!!!

910701029.content: Oh, you're being cruel now. Why am I not allowed to do this, but Tsukuyomi is?

910701030.content: You know that's a completely different situation...

910701031.content: Shush. Come, let me help you relax!

910701035.content: I just don't think any of the stuff inside will be useful... Don't we have much more advanced models back at the office?

910701036.content: Ha ha. But there's stuff here that you can't find back there.

910701038.content: Stuff we could use tonight, of course...

910703001.content: Alright, Admin, Come sit over here. This shop's been around for over a decade now, so their AC's a little old.

910703002.content: (Tummy rumbling) Oops, sorry. I got a little excited while shopping earlier. Now I'm hungry...

910703004.content: Hello! What would the two of you like?

910703005.content: I want a bowl of your Supreme Shio Egg Ramen.

910703006.content: A bowl of tonkatsu ramen for me, please.

910703007.content: Sounds like you're having a light meal today, Buzenbo.

910703010.content: So, this is the Supreme Ramen? Oh wow—it's stacked so high, it looks like a mountain...

910703011.content: One, two, three... Wow, it's got five eggs in there!

910703012.content: I have to get more protein in me, since I train so much. Bon appetit!

910703015.content: It's alright, Admin, take your time. I'll wait for you.

910703017.content: By the way, Buzenbo... why do you keep staring at me like that?

910703019.content: Used to be that I'd come here by myself most of the time. I didn't have anyone to share this tasty ramen with.

910703020.content: I'm just so happy that you invited me out today.

910703021.content: Whoo... That warmed me right up. I feel alive again.

910703022.content: Are you alright? I can go buy you some hot tea.

910703023.content: No, it's alright. I'll be okay in a little while. It's my own fault for not checking the forecast before I came out—I didn't realize it'd snow today.

910703024.content: It's the first snow of the season! Would the two of you be interested in one of our Twosome's First Snow Talisman? It'll keep you two together for a long, long time!

910703028.content: Hmm? Your face is a little flushed, Buzenbo. Is it from the cold outside?

910703029.content: No... Do you like this talisman, Admin?

910703030.content: Yeah. The snow in it is as pretty as the actual snow that fell today. It's so pleasing to look at it.

910703031.content: And since you were kind enough to buy me ramen just now, Buzenbo, this is my gift to you.

910703032.content: Excellent choice! Since you're getting the talisman, why don't I throw in the matching Twosome's First Snow Gloves as well?

910703033.content: And of course, I'd be remiss if I didn't point you to the ultra-high-capacity First Snow Trekker's Pack. It has plenty of room to hold all your shopping and then some...

910703035.content: Oof... Now that I've got everything on, it's all rather heavy... How are you doing, Buzenbo?

910703037.content: You're nodding. I take it you're saying "Everything's fine"? Well, at least we won't feel cold anymore, ha ha! Let's go.

910703039.content: Come over here, Buzenbo. There's a table tennis table!

910703040.content: Do you want to play, Admin?

910703041.content: Of course. Feels like a nice thing to do after soaking in the hot spring. Don't you think so, Buzenbo?

910703042.content: Although I was only taught briefly by my father... I should do alright against you, Admin.

910703043.content: Ooh, someone's feeling confident! Here, take this.

910703048.content: Wow, you cleaved the ball clean into two... Unfortunately, that's against the rules.

910703049.content: Sorry. It felt a bit like training just now—my instincts just took over.

910703051.content: Heh heh, I have the points advantage now. Get ready!

910703054.content: Buzenbo... My forehead hurts... I can't see clearly...

910703055.content: I was careless with my serve... Let me take a look at your eyes.

910703056.content: Thank goodness... It looks like it just scraped your forehead. You should feel better in a bit.

910703057.content: Okay... Ah, is there a sofa in this room? I don't remember seeing one, but this cushion is so soft...

910703058.content: No, you're not on a sofa...

910703059.content: Don't say anything right now, Admin... Just lean on me for a moment.

910704001.content: Wow, it's really busy in here... So this is what people in Sasanami get up to, huh? Have you played pachinko before, Buzenbo?

910704002.content: Hmm... There are some commonalities between pachinko and the way of the sword...

910704003.content: So that means you haven't really played it before, have you? Come on, let's find ourselves a machine!

910704005.content: Wow... One, two, three, four... That's a lot of zeroes. I can't believe I won the big prize on my first try!

910704006.content: Do you want to take a shot, Buzenbo?

910704007.content: Buzenbo tries again and again, but doesn't win a thing.

910704008.content: Looks like Lady Luck isn't on your side today.

910704009.content: That's alright... I probably used up my luck somewhere else.

910704010.content: Besides, I already feel lucky that you took me out with you today, Admin.

910704011.content: I rarely see you drink, Buzenbo. Is there a reason you invited me here today?

910704012.content: I can still enjoy drinks in moderation, despite my training. Besides... it's also important to me to come to bars with my loved ones and spend time with them.

910704013.content: And so the two of us spend the night swapping insights and interesting stories while we down cup after cup.

910704014.content: I'm feeling a little woozy. But Buzenbo doesn't seem to be affected at all.

910704015.content: Admin! I have something to say to you!

910704016.content: Ah... I guess she has been affected, after all.

910704019.content: Wait! Finish what you have to say before you pass out!!!

910704020.content: But the young lady is already leaning on my shoulder, holding my hand tightly, her breathing even.

910704021.content: I don't often see you like this, Buzenbo. And since you've been waiting for me all this time... I have to take you home.

910704022.content: My legs and feet feel like they're full of lead. Visiting the home appliance store ended up being even worse than going on a mission. How is anyone supposed to choose from all those things on offer???

910704023.content: Do you want to take a break, Admin? Or should we head back for now?

910704024.content: I want to look around a little more. There are so many appliances to choose from here, I feel like I could buy everything a family needs for a lifetime at once. It feels nice, for some reason.

910704025.content: I'm... thinking the same thing, Admin...

910704026.content: In the past, whenever I came here, I'd imagine what kind of people I would buy these appliances with, what kind of life I'd lead with them.

910704027.content: At first, I wasn't quite sure whom I would be with. Then, over time, the picture became clearer...

910704029.content: We're almost at the cooking appliances section. Do you want to come check out the selection with me?

910704030.content: I already have just about every fully automatic kitchen appliance I'd need... Let's make a meal together sometime, Admin.

910705001.content: Having a glass of milk after soaking in the hot spring is a habit for many people in Sasanami. Would you like a bottle too, Admin? I can get one for you.

910705003.content: Mmm... I must have stayed in the pool too long. My arm feels a little weak...

910705004.content: Let me massage it for you. If you spend a good amount of time soaking, you have to remember to rehydrate and cool yourself down afterward. Here you go.

910705005.content: Hmm? Did you say that just so I'd feed you? ... I don't know what to do with you, Admin.

910705006.content: Table manners are important to the people of Sasanami, and they usually don't make a lot of noise at the dining table. Ramen, however, is the exception to the rule.

910705007.content: You should be eating your ramen like this. (Slurps)

910705009.content: You can be bolder than that, Admin. Slurping is a form of praise to the ramen chef. The louder your slurps, the tastier you're saying your ramen is.

910705011.content: Oh no, did the broth go down the wrong way down? I'm so sorry, Admin, I should have told you to go slowly. Here, have some tea...

910705012.content: This is the first time I've had sake. Mmm... it tastes a little like rice wine.

910705013.content: That's because sake is made from rice.

910705014.content: Mmm... I like it. Another cup for me, please!

910705015.content: Don't be fooled, Admin. Sake may go down smoothly, but it has quite a kick to it.

910705016.content: Even I have... underestimated what sake can do, thanks to Kuninotokotachi's cajoling. There is one entire night I still cannot remember, no matter how I try.

910705017.content: But you'll still be decent with me even if I drink too much of it, right, Tsukuyomi?

910705019.content: Are you sure? You don't want to do anything at all...?

910706002.content: I can sense you have a headache coming on.

910706003.content: I'm not good at choosing presents.

910706004.content: Besides, I don't know if the other person actually needs it.

910706005.content: (Sighs) Are you choosing these for your team members?

910706006.content: Yes, but... how do I put it...? Tell me, Admin, if you were the recipient, which of these would you prefer?

910706007.content: Let me think... Maybe something like this.

910706008.content: I understand. I'll go pay for this, then.

910706009.content: Huh? Are you sure? I was just stating my personal preference, though.

910706012.content: Oh no... Look at the time. I thought we'd only been here for a little while.

910706013.content: That's because you keep thinking you still have a chance, Admin.

910706014.content: I'm so sorry! We don't have time to look around anymore.

910706015.content: It's alright. I wanted you to have the opportunity to relax, anyway.

910706016.content: And since you looked so happy, Admin, I didn't want to stop you.

910706017.content: Really, the fault is mine and not yours...

910706018.content: No, no, no, I was clearly overconfident... Tell you what—I'll buy you dinner tonight.

910706019.content: Are you sure you still can afford that, Admin?

910706021.content: Let's go. I'll make dinner tonight.

910706022.content: We can talk about what we want to do in the evening later. Let's go to my place for dinner first.

910706023.content: The home appliance industry seems to be quite advanced here in Sasanami, doesn't it?

910706024.content: I agree. I've seen quite a few new things on this visit.

910706025.content: Do you know what this is, Admin?

910706026.content: Let me see... it's a "cocoon rocking chair for two." Strange as the concept sounds, it does look rather comfy.

910706027.content: Want to give it a try?

910706029.content: Admin... Is it just me, or are the armrests moving inwards...?

910706030.content: I think I know why it's called "cocoon" now.

910706032.content: I'm really sorry! I, um... Please bear with me for a moment...

910709001.content: Thanks for helping me choose a gift for the Ninja Irregulars.

910709002.content: I thought you just wanted someone to come shopping with you. I didn't know I'd be expected to have some input as well.

910709003.content: Well, you're a really interesting human, Admin. I trust you, and I trust your taste. Besides...

910709006.content: While the gift-shopping was a spur-of-the-moment decision, I've been planning this outing for some time. This is the candy apple I made especially for the occasion.

910709007.content: I won! It feels so good to hear the pachinko balls drop into the tray. It makes me feel so happy.

910709008.content: Do you know why that is?

910709009.content: It's because... I'm lucky that an improbably good thing happened to me.

910709011.content: It makes me so happy to be friends with you, and to go on an outing with you like this.

910709012.content: What do you think, Admin? Isn't this ramen tasty?

910709013.content: There's a good bite to the noodles, and the broth's robust and flavorful. I wish I could ask for a second bowl, but I don't have any more room in my stomach.

910709014.content: Mmhmm! The Ninkyoumon will only recommend the best in Shimogyou!

910709015.content: Are we done? If we are, we should get going now!

910709016.content: Wait, wait! Just one more sip of broth!

910709017.content: Of course. The whole point of this outing is for you to have a good time.

910709018.content: But there are still many places I want to go with you, so you must save some time for me too.

910710001.content: Oh my, Admin, look at your face! It's... beet red!

910710002.content: Y-you're getting a little too close!

910710003.content: Well, we don't always get to do this. Besides, Admin, don't tell me you're one of those "grass-eaters" talk about...?

910710004.content: You know, I'm so warmed up right now...

910710007.content: S-s-s-stop saying things like that! I can see it in your face! You're just waiting for me to trip up so you can beat me up!!!

910710008.content: Owwwww it's spicy!!! My tongue... I can't feel my tongue...

910710009.content: Why are you drinking so fast? This is your first time having it!

910710010.content: Let me have some of your shaved ice.

910710012.content: Oof, that's cold.... But now I'm ready to go again! One more cup, please!

910710013.content: You really shouldn't push yourself like that.

910710014.content: You've been here for, what, almost 20 minutes now?

910710015.content: It's really warm and relaxing here! Don't worry about me—just go do whatever you want! I could stay here all day!

910710016.content: It's boiling hot in here. Come on, let's go!

910710017.content: Huh? You're being so strange, Admin.

910710018.content: You can go without me, can't you? Or, oh—are you worried you'll get lost? Is that why you won't leave by yourself?

910710019.content: OR.... is it that you can't bear to leave me behind???

910711001.content: You've been standing at this counter for a while now.

910711003.content: If you're not sure whether or not you should buy something, don't.

910711004.content: It's not that. I'm trying to choose a gift for someone.

910711005.content: It must be a really important gift, given how much time you're spending on it.

910711006.content: I suppose so... Would you help me? Come in a little closer.

910711008.content: Hmm, I was right. This necklace suits you better. Alright, we'll get this one, then.

910711009.content: Is this... for me? Huh—I see that you get rather sneaky in places like this...

910711012.content: Um... then why are you holding my hand so tightly?

910711013.content: Like I said, I'm not tipsy...

910711014.content: But I have to go pay the bill.

910711016.content: Ah.... Okay. There's no real hurry to pay it, anyway. Let's sit here a little while longer.

910711017.content: So this is what you meant by "rest"...

910711018.content: Well... I was just afraid that you were tired. That's all.

910711019.content: I see. Then what are you doing over there, so far away? Scoot in a little closer.

910711020.content: Since that's what you want... ARGH!!! It's so cold!!!

910711022.content: Stop, stop, what are you doing?! Wha-wha...?

910711023.content: Didn't you say you wanted to rest? Then surely it's alright for me to lean on you for a while.

910712001.content: What's the matter? Why are you staring at me like that?

910712002.content: I was just wondering how you're able to eat ramen without making a single sound.

910712003.content: Oh, I see... Well, there's nothing to it, really. You just have to practice.

910712004.content: You make it sound so easy... (Slurping) See? It's not "nothing," after all.

910712006.content: Everything in this store looks so intriguing.

910712007.content: Intriguing? Ah, they tend to carry the more popular models, and most of them come with one new feature or another.

910712008.content: Wanna give something a try? Maybe this smart camera?

910712010.content: Alright, let's do it. Three, two, one, cheese!

910712011.content: Could you explain something to me... Why are there so many hearts floating around in the picture? And why do I have kitty ears?

910712012.content: They're so adorable, aren't they? This photo touch-up feature is all the rage right now, you know.

910712013.content: What's going on?! There must be something wrong with this machine! There's no way someone can play so many times and not win even once!

910712014.content: According to probability, the predicted return from gambling is less than zero, anyway.

910712016.content: That is to say, even if the machine isn't rigged, your loss streak isn't out of the ordinary.

910712017.content: Senba... you don't have to be so blunt.

910712018.content: But if I'm not straightforward about it, you might continue.

910712019.content: Well... I don't have an argument for that. But why didn't you stop me earlier?

910712020.content: Because... your expression when you lose is adorable. I had to see it a few more times.

317171001.content: The space is enclosed, yet the onslaught of foes is never-ending.

317171004.content: A chill light blade flashes and slices with surgical precision through The General's defenses. It cuts through all it meets, including even his weighty sword itself.

317171005.content: Several kunai target her. It's a dangerous moment, just as Tsukuyomi might be relaxing after defeating The General.

317171007.content: Tsukuyomi, of course, was not relaxing. With a flick of the tip of her blade she knocks the kunai back.

317171009.content: The explosives strapped to the kunai detonate, yet the blast is dispersed by a series of flickers of lightning.

317171010.content: A strategy which relies on an enemy's foolishness will always fail.

317171011.content: The light of the blade fades as quickly as it appeared. She's striking even more quickly than before and her Ninja Guard opponents have no time to react. They grunt and fall to the floor, dead.

317171013.content: I am well aware I have little chance against your blade. But there are reasons I cannot retreat.

317171014.content: A misguided faith. Such a shame.

317171015.content: Two blades flash and there is a sudden clashing crescendo, then an equally sudden calm. Squire makes good use of the strength faith brings and holds out against Tsukuyomi for several rounds before falling dead.

317171017.content: The next enemy charges, driving several blades home in a precise and frenetic attack, targeting the few flaws Tsukuyomi displayed in the earlier fights. Even a fighter as strong as her is forced to become defensive.

317171018.content: But that only lasts as long as the first wave, and then things change. Tsukuyomi's blade sparks with electric light and leaps to the enemy's weakest point. Within three rounds, the winner is clear.

317171019.content: Hmm... So even with their sacrifices, I cannot defeat you?

317171020.content: Your tactics were admirable. But still inadequate.

317171021.content: An enemy's praise. It makes it all worthwhile.

317171022.content: The Strategist, defeated, becomes another puff of smoke dispersed on the wind.
